lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello, and welcome to Critical Role, with me, Sam Riegel. Everyone else is away in various places so I'm the host for tonight, I'm running a one-off one-shot with my friends-- I hope they're my friends--

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have-- yeah, we'll see. I have lots of announcements and it's up to me to do them all, so I'll dive right in. First one I'll need your help with. Tonight's sponsor for Critical Role is Star Wars Battlefront II! Star Wars Battlefront II releases tomorrow, the 17th of November, features a new single-player campaign where you can play as Iden Versio, commander of the Inferno Squad and Imperial Special Forces Unit.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: (sings the Imperial March)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Multi-player mode allows you to battle across all three Star Wars eras, fight side-by-side with your favorite characters and experience the thrilling dogfights of starfighter battle. And this is where I need your help. Some of the awesome things you can do in the game are so cool they require sound effects. Like, for instance, you can hurtle between the rooftops of Theed in a speeding starfighter--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (zooming)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Flying sounds!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As Darth Maul you can raise your lightsaber--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (deep humming)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --and slash through armies of clones.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (slashing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can also play as iconic Star Wars villains and heroes, including Emperor Palpatine--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: DIE!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's better. Or Chewbacca--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (wookie noises)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's available on PC, PS4, and XBox One tomorrow November 17th, get it! Okay, next announcement. Critical Role d20 sets are currently sold out. Merch lord Arcade tells us they should be back in stock within a month. Okay. Next. The art book--

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Sam, it's okay, everything's okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's so many announcements! Usually we spread this around, but none of you--

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Do you not trust us to read these pieces of paper?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: H read, starting from art book there.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Starting from art book, okay. All right, here we go. Art book! Both standard and deluxe editions available in the Alpha and Geek & Sundry store. The deluxe edition is going fast, so act now! While supplies last! Or you will regret it for the rest of your goddamn life.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That is what it says actually, wow! (accented) Episode 71 to 85 of the Critical Role-- (normal voice) I don't know why I'm doing that-- Critical Role podcast have been released into the wild this morning. Make sure to check them out on iTunes, Google Play and criticalrolepodcast.geekandsundry.com. I don't think I'm in those, so no rush.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Gosh. The Critical Role podcast -- I'm assuming that's what CR stands for in this context-- is now available through the Amazon Alexa. If you have one, simply ask Alexa to "Open "Critical Role" and get started. If you don't have one, go get it so you can listen that easily. It is available on Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Echo Plus, and other Alexa-enabled devices.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: No Alexa, not critical bowl, not critical bowl!

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: No, Alexa, god damn it, Alexa.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Issue number three of Critical Role Vox Machina: Origins comes out November 29th. Make sure to check it out on digital.darkhorse.com or Comixology. Christmas, holiday, Hanukkah spectacular--

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: For those who don't like to touch your comics or turn the pages with your fingers.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Yeah. If you are at PAX Unplugged, make sure to go see Taliesin, Liam, Matt, and Marisha, they will be doing a panel in the main theater tomorrow at 1:00 to 2:30pm Eastern Standard Time.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: She added the pm.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I did add the pm, that is the after--

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: What if it's am?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I almost can 100% swear it is not 1:00 to 2:30am. But we'll see. I can't stop you from showing up at one am.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: But then did you get this part?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Oh, and then, 5.30 to 7.30pm-- maybe-- in the Queue hall, they will be doing an autograph signing, it's going to be really exciting, and you can say hi to them, and then they'll say hi back, and they're all lovely people.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: They're true fans.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Hashtag Force Grey finale in NYC, which I'm assuming is New York City, on Saturday 11/18, that's November 18th. Matt, Joe, Marisha--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're just literally reading what's there.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I'm literally reading what's there. New episode of Madness came out today on projectalpha.com!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: See, you left that for the Hatter!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: We're already in sync, this is going to be so awesome!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Do the thing where you throw the paper.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Oh yeah. I'm going to hurt somebody.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: You can't hurt steel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so that's the announcements, you guys have anything else you would like to add or plug?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I would like to announce that you are doing a great job, Sam. We believe in you and we're so excited.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Half the job of being a good boss is knowing how to delegate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: No matter what goes down from this point on, I think we can call this a success.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just go quickly around the room for people who don't know you fine people. I think in chat there's going to be links to your Twitters and all that stuff, but this is H Michael Croner over here, a funny man. This is Noelle Stevenson, a funny lady, this is Molly Ostertag, this is Sophia Sarah--

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I'm not a funny lady.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: We're having our own personal D&D night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys are also funny people, you're also funny people. Amy Vorpahl and Yuri Lowenthal, also funny people and they're all here to help play a game, this is only my second time ever dungeon mastering, so forgive me if I suck, and I think we're ready to dive into tonight's episode--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi and welcome back everyone, welcome to tonight's show, all right, so we'll just dive in--

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I thought you said welcome to the Tonight Show.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Iceberg!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Oh my god, I was transported for like five seconds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone follows him with expectant happy expressions. I forgot to hit play on the music-- (music plays)

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Aww!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: How tasteful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "The purpose of this cruise is simple: you are all single on a quest for true love, and I "will not stop until at least one couple finds their storybook happy ending. Think it can't "happen? Well have you ever heard of the old woman who lived in a shoe, who had so many kids she "didn't know what to do? She met her husband right here on this ship. Some of you have cruised with "us before, so you know the drill, and all of my corny jokes. Ah, Hansel, Gretel, good to see you "again. Easy on the gingerbread tonight. Aladdin! Still stealing hearts, I see. Oop, Big Bad Wolf is "here, ladies, hope you didn't wear red dresses!"

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Oh ho ho!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I kid, I kid. We'll be dining and dancing at sea for another day, and then arrive on "Pleasure Island, where you'll go on romantic excursions, culminating in the famous Hot Coal "Walk. But first, we'll start the cruise with a fun 'getting to know you' exercise called 'speed "'dating.' We'll pair you up according to those questionnaires we had you fill out, and give you "90 seconds to meet and see if there's any chemistry. If there isn't, no big deal, there's "plenty more chances. But if you do sense a spark, let me know, and we'll pair you up again. So, "let's get started!" Can you guys all roll a d20 and tell me what you've rolled?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'm an eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, say that again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Anybody who knows me won't be surprised, two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Does one of us just die?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I think I know which one--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, the Queen of Hearts steps forward, a fierce, hulking woman. She cracks her knuckles and grips her dented royal scepter. They face together. "All right, everyone, I'm going to give you 90 seconds "to ask each other questions about former relationships, goals, desires, pet peeves, getting "to know you stuff. It's all up to you, if you'd like, I gave you some sample questions if you get "stuck, but you don't need to use them. Just in case, right? And the clock will begin--" Holy shit, I need a timing device! Fuck it, I'll just count in my head.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: If only that stupid rabbit were here!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: You don't have a phone with a timer on it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess I do, right?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: You could count out loud if you would like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The clock button, right? Okay. Oh, there's a stopwatch, okay, got it, ready? "Let us begin the "clock now."

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I'd like to take charge here, as I am ready for anything! Do you prefer the strong women?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, I would say I'm really into strong women. I do very well with strong women, strong women everywhere love me, you know? I'm very charming, everyone finds me very charming. And I keep stealing glances, I'm very distracted clearly, stealing glances at Wendy across the room, who I've realized is here. And trying to appear engaged.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Who the hell are you distracted by?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Do you ever think about such things?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: That's serious game.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Yeah, how fucking dare you! I shall live forever and if I do ever die I will be the owner of all of the kingdoms in all the land and I will die of old age well after you, my pet!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: You know, I really like that in a woman, a woman who never dies? I also intend to never die, because I'm never going to die, I believe that.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: What was your last relationship with a very strong woman?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I have myself dated many, many, many, many strong women. Don't worry, I dated, uh, many--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "And that's time, everyone! Excellent"

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I think we hit it off!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Yes. We'll talk later and see if there was any chemistry--"

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I'm conflicted!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "All right, I will start my timing device, and ask away."

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Did you kill that wolf yourself?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: My god, that's so cool. You know, my spirit animal is a fox, so I really don't care about wolves.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Yes, I've only killed a few foxes. Also friends, both--

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: That's also cool.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I haven't seen you here before.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: No, this is my first time.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I've been a few times.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: It's quite a lovely experience, I have to say.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: What keeps bringing you back?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Just, you know?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Is it the canapes?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: No, did you taste them?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Well, don't!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: All right! I simply just like new experiences, and there's always an interesting cast of characters, sometimes people who I'd rather not be here. Anyway, what is your best or most terrible memory? I just looked at the sheet, just wondering.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Oh, my best and my worst memory are pretty much one and the same.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Yeah, I was, you know, talking about romantic things, I was being romantic with a couple of friends of mine in a portable hole--

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Several!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: And several--

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I like the sound of that.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Yeah, you know, we thought it would be fun, but there's only so much air in a portable hole.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: That's my advice. From me to you.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Unless you're really into like (choking noises). And we were, so it worked out.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: That does sound terrible and best.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: We almost died but it was amazing. So that's why it's the best and worst.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I think I like you.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I think I like you!

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "And time. I think we have a potential match here, excellent excellent. I'll write that down, "okay. And our next match for the evening will be Scarecrow and Goldilocks. Please come out to the "table." The Scarecrow stands six foot six, is lanky, wobbly and stuffed with straw. His eyes are a little crossed. Goldilocks steps forward, a strong young human girl in a pink dress. She belches as she steps forward to meet her match.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: (belch)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "All right, I will start the clock, and please, leave your hearts and minds open to new "adventures."

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Hi, do you currently love anyone, or are you open to loving someone new?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: My last relationship ended so bad, he was just not just right, so--

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Oh, who was he?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Oh, you don't know him, he's (laughs) I don't really want to get into it.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Anyway, that's why I went brunette now--

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Oh, it looks good on your head.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Thank you, your head looks good on your straw body.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Thanks, I just sewed it up so I'm wearing the hat to cover up the new seam.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Huff, what is that?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Huh? Oh, this is a brand of scarecrow hat, it's super popular in this town I've been in.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Oh, are you sponsored?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Wow, a sponsored scarecrow!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'm pretty nimble and shit, so I do like skateboarding and stuff when I'm not--

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I guess that's a good use for your floppy body.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Yeah, it's hard to get work when you're flammable, you can't work in kitchens and shit.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Do you run hot?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: No, I have no body temperature whatsoever, but if you run cold--

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I hate it too hot, and too cold, so I don't know. I'm trying to get rid of my standards for just right and just be open. I'd be open to maybe having a fling, but I don't know, I'm not really sure.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: That's great, my last girlfriend was a swarm of flying monkeys, and so I'm super open as well.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: That could be fun.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: No. Objectively no. Because even if you're connecting with one, others are over, shitting on you.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Hey, some people are into that.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'm not. I'm absorbent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sleeping Beauty is paired up with Jack, but he keeps talking about his beanstalk and she dozes off. The cute little Hunchback of Notre Dame tries to get a word in edgewise with the very bossy Mary Mary Quite Contrary. And then Little Miss Muffett hits it off with Humpty Dumpty. It's great. At the end of it all, the Beast returns. "Okay, well done, "everyone. I tried speed-dating when I was younger, but my dates would always scream and run away "before the clock started, right, Beauty?" So he turns over to Beauty, she forces a smile and waves. "Okay, now go refresh those cocktails, we'll have more romantic activities in a few "minutes, and if anyone sensed a spark of chemistry in that last exercise, come over and let me know, "I'll be by the bar." As the Beast leaves, the guests mill about, refill their drinks over at the bar, what would you guys like to do?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Keeping her eyes on Peter Pan to see if he's watching, Wendy walks over to the Beast and says, hello handsome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Who, me? I'm taken, but thank you."

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Oh, I know. I wanted to let you know I think the Hatter's quite lovely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Oh yes? So that's a potential match?"

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: You can put that down as a check, definitely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "We'll schedule an excursion maybe with the two of you later."

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Love it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Let me write this here so I won't lose it."

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I put on the form-- Peter Pan is here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I requested that he not be here when I am.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I can't-- We tried to reschedule Peter for another cruise, but he had a thing, apparently, so "he needed to come on this one. And who am I to turn away a customer? Don't worry, we won't pair "you up together. We'll try to keep you as far apart as we can. We're sensitive to exes on this "vessel, and everyone here is just here to have a fun time, including Peter."

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "If you'd like me to have a word with him, I can."

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: (sighs) Just--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Or a message you'd like me to--"

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "It's fine?"

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I can handle him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "All right. Here, take a drink ticket on me."

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Oh! She takes it and strides away to the bar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "All right, excellent."

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'd like to approach the Queen of Hearts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, go ahead.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Hey, do you currently love anyone or are open to loving someone new?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I need some advice. I don't currently love anyone and I'm looking for the new king of my kingdom.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Oh! That'd be cool.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Yes. But look. I'm hoping-- I know that I'm a perfect woman, but it seems as though the men I'm interested in are wandering eyes. Do you have any advice? Should I be myself or should I femme it up?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: You're literally attracted to wandering eyes? I feel like you should date people with whole bodies.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Oh! I see what you're saying. Semantics are important.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'm sorry, I don't catch onto stuff good.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: You're doing great. I know the men that I want to date are little, scrawny yes-men. But the ones that they are interested in, well, they seem a little smaller and daintier. Should I act dainty?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I will say that when you did that movement, I did become very aroused. Which is hard for me because I don't have blood.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Is it very hard for you? (increasingly awkward laughter)

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay! This is good.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: We weren't even instructed to and yet we made a connection.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: (loudly laughs) You got a vein coming out of your face! (laughter)

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I would like to approach the bar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Hello! May I help you?"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Yes. I don't know if you just heard this conversation behind me, but I absolutely need a drink.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Wendy looks over because she's at the bar too and says: already?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Oh, yeah! Question: they were included on the trip price, right? It's all-you-can-drink?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "You get standard rail drinks like ale and mead. But if you want anything--"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: What about Cristal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Cristal? That would be a premium beverage that you would have to pay additional for."

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I'm a premium person.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I got you.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Thanks!

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: It can be hard on these things, I know.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Does your ticket cover Cristal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Oh, you have a drink ticket?"

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Ordinarily it would be two gold, but yes, I'll take this."

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Here you go. Very good. That's right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He hands you your drink.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Well, I have to get her a drink now too, so you can put that on my tab. What would you like?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Oh, just a wine.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: A wine.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: A rose. Thank you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "We have a lovely sparkling rose."

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Yeah, your top shelf.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Top shelf? Well."

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He goes and gets a dusty bottle and blows it off, pours you another glass.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: So your ex is here?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: It's a bit of a nightmare.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: That blows.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: The men here are literal monsters. I don't know if you noticed, I mean, some are literally monsters.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I made sure that Prince Charming was not on this boat because that would be awful.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Oh, did you and him--?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Yeah. Not right.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: What's Peter doing? Wendy looks over to glare at him.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Standing, having a drink, there's some women standing near me and I am pretending to be involved in the conversation they're in, but they're not talking to me. I'm striking a pose and looking charming, as usual.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: He's not that cute, don't worry about it.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: You know, I was into him when I was a kid.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: So were we all. Ugh. Grow up.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I know! Sometimes you have to grow up and become an adult.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I see both glance over to me and I'm like, okay. And so I slide up to the bar and I'm like: Oh hey! You said your name was Goldilocks? Oh Wendy, you're here too? I didn't even see you there. Wow.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: All right, Peter. We don't have to play the little game each time. I was literally on the stage doing speed dating and you definitely saw me.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Hey. So what's your deal? What's up with you? Wow, this is encouraging. This is an encouraging look I'm getting right now from you.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Do you have a drink ticket?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: For you, I have so many drink tickets.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Not sensing the tension in this conversation

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Huh.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: All right, look--

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I'm always open.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: We're in the middle of something, you could just play cool.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: What?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Well, I don't have blood so I have to because I naturally run very cold. I'm always the temperature of my air.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, I noticed that some sparks are really flying with you and the Queen of Hearts. In fact, so many sparks that I was a little worried you'd burst into flames.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'm not a big sparks guy!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Don't do that. How are you doing?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Confused.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah. Same, always.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Me too!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: You seem cool.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: You seem cool!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: You want to hang out?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Let's do it!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay. Let's have a walk!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah! We're going for a walk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Bye! I'll ask you about your love life later.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a little side deck off the banquet hall that you can see the rolling waves and stuff if you would like to go outside, or you can stay in the banquet hall.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: You want to go out and look at the rolling waves?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Fuck yeah!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm mostly into ladies, but I'm also into dudes. What about you? Are you into dudes at all? I just want to be buddies.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: You know, it's whatever you want.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: We're on a singles' cruise.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: God, I'm batting a thousand today.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: You'd be a very good listener.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I really am! My bar is so low these days.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I've got a lot to work through, but you seem like you're a really big heart.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Thank you! I'm missing other organs, so yeah, I'm pretty much running on heart these days.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: What other organs are you missing?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Brain.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Really? I had no idea. I would not have guessed that at all. That's so interesting.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'm actually the most high-functioning non-brain-equipped thing that I know.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I can see that. You say that, and I totally see that. Hey, do me a favor. Is Wendy looking over here at all?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: She's pretending not to but she's like side-eyeing you very hard.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah. Awesome. So let's keep talking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Oh, I just was about to say, I go over to the side of the ship to puke from this conversation. I wanted to bring Wendy with me and then I don't. I was like: Oh man, that sounds really awful, what you went through. It sounds like it was a long time period together. That sucks that he's here.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: You know, it's fine. I'm very past it. I've had a lot of adventures, a lot of travels since then. How about you? Any-- well, Prince Charming? He's a bad ex? Yeah?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I've heard he's a real dick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As they talk, the Mad Hatter is mingling about, I imagine.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: People don't notice me because I'm so short.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. And actually--

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I could pop up at any time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Actually, a very tipsy Big Bad Wolf is staggering across the room, knocks clean into you, doesn't say sorry, just keeps going. He's seven feet tall. He's loud. His breath reeks of cherry brandy. He's walking across the room towards Goldilocks.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Do I see that happen?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Hey, Goldilocks!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: What?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Goldilocks, someone's coming.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: What's coming?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: It's me, baby! How are you? (laughs)

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to ask, on a scale of one to ten, how good of an opener do you think that is?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: See, I don't--

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Do you think that's appropriate for ladies? Do you think you would ever get someone, say, the Queen of Hearts, to put a mouth on you?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: It works on dudes. I don't see why it shouldn't work on ladies!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just then, the Big Bad Wolf interrupts your conversation and says, "Goldie. Baby! What gives? "I invited you to my birthday party last week. It was a kegger, no show. What's up? You too good for "the Big Bad Wolf?"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I'm allergic to beer, but I heard you liked red, so I just thought I'd be a little tease.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He puts his paw on your shoulder and goes in close.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Where's my reaction? Shield.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will roll to see if I beat Shield. What is your spell DC? Hold on. Goldilocks...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I fail. The Big Bad Wolf knocks straight into the Shield and doesn't quite understand. He's kind of drunk. He tries again. He just keeps hitting this invisible wall. He's like, "Ugh! What "the fuck? Come on! I'm just trying to talk to you."

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I'm vegetarian.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "What does that have to do with anything?"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Stop eating helpless creatures!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Come on, baby. I could make you howl all night. Come on."

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "All right. Fine." He goes one more time and hits the wall.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: You know what you need, Big Bad Wolf? You seem a little tense.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Big Bad?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: And I use my Massage cantrip.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: What?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I mean, I can only get at his calf--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that's Message, but I'll allow it.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Message, Massage, whatever you want! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey. He's crazy, this guy. Who knows what spells come out of this guy?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Wait, what's a cantrip?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a type of magical spell.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I don't know anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He has one called Message but he, in his craziness, has reinterpreted--

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: It's just the way I pronounce things! It's a

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So the Big Bad Wolf suddenly feels tension relieving in his upper back and lower neck and also, your voice in his ear, telling him-- what are you telling him?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Just relax, baby. Just relax!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "What? Oh, this is fucked up." He retreats.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: (shouting) I'm on the Lito deck!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's freaked out. He leaves in a huff.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Hey, thanks, Mad Hatter, for using your special Massage skills.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Oh, you're-- well, I was hitting on him.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Oh, cool.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I'm sorry. Was there?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: No! Man, go do good. I think he's also in the Lito deck.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Would you call yourself a tiny man?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Oh, I am

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: That is very interesting to me. I thought you were in a partnership with a hare?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: He always wants to know what time it is. He always wants to talk about time. Well, I don't really care about time. I really don't pay attention to time. I would say that I live outside of time.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Well, I am a tiny man, and you are a big woman--

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Yeah, no shit!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: We should get together. I have dated far bigger people than you. And some creatures.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Oh my! Well, I'm a human and I like my men small and agreeable.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I can be agreeable.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: No. Yes, you can.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: No, I can't. Yes, I can!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Very funny! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The audience hushes as the Beast tries to get your attention again. (clears throat) "All right, "everyone all drinked up and ready for the next exercise? Good."

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Not understanding that an announcement's about to happen, I walk up to the Beast and go, hey, I just wanted to let you know really quick. I think I have a potential match with Peter Pan and Goldilocks and the Queen of Hearts.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: But we just haven't met yet!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Oh. Hey man! Are you currently in love with anyone and are you open to loving someone new?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Oh. We can do this later."

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: You don't have a match with me, just so you know.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Yeah, I didn't say you.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Just put that down--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Back off.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Put it down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "All right. I can see the drinks are flowing tonight! Henrick, go easy on it from now on. Now "it's time for our second big event. It's time to learn the official dance of Storybook Love Singles' "Cruise: The Electric Slide. And who better to teach a clumsy oaf how to dance than my own "bride? Here she is, the real animal of our relationship, Beauty! Take it away!" Beauty rolls her eyes at his stupid joke and strides onto the dance floor. "Okay. Listen up, you scrubs! The "Electric Slide is the most alluring and easy to teach of the Slides. There's only five steps you "got to remember. I need a volunteer. Who's it going to be? Oh. You, Goldie! All right, get up "here. Okay, the first step: You do the grapevine to the right. One, two, three, four and tap your "foot." Roll an acrobatics check.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Roll an acrobatics?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An acrobatics ability check

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Let's see! It's eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Plus two. So it's a ten!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you fail.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: The Electric Slide is hard!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's try again, all right? Then you grapevine to "the left one, two, three, four." Roll another acrobatics check.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: That's another eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Her dress rips a little. It's awkward.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Woo!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: That's inappropriate. I'm so sorry about your dress, Belle. You're really great at dancing, I don't mean to step on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anybody else want to try?"

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Me! I am tiny, but lithe!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Yes, you, small man!"

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Bring the tinyman up, I'd love to see you perform!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Come on over. The Electric Slide is very easy to do. Children can do it."

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I am the same height as a child!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Hear hear!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "You first grapevine to the right, one, two, three, four." Roll an acrobatics check.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: 18 plus three.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah! You all watch as the Mad Hatter seems to already know this dance by heart. He goes right, he goes left, he goes back, he goes forward. He's got hip movements and swagger. He does a little thing with his hair at the end. He blows a kiss to the audience.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'm excited to meet you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The audience is enthralled, they applaud. As the class goes on, everyone's having a good time learning the dance. Suddenly, and quite without warning-- oh boy. The ship, which had been gently gliding through the ocean, lurches to one side, knocking glasses off tables and causing some of the ice sculptures to shatter to the floor. Is this working?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: It's still so pleasing! Calming! But I feel like something really bad is happening!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone, please roll your d20s for a dexterity save.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I failed!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What'd you get?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Nine plus one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so ten for you. Yes, go on, Noelle?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That is a 21.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: One!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Six plus three, is the modifier? Nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hatter and Wendy both fall to the floor.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Oh, the tinyman!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wendy, actually, falls into some broken glass and you take one hit point.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Can it be a cool little thing on my face?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. On your face, it's pretty badass.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Yeah! I'm pissed off.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: But your perfect complexion!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The explosions above grow faster and more intense. Shouting and footsteps can be heard above deck, screams of pain. Just then a sailor, one of the crew, face bloody, runs down the steps into the banquet hall yelling, "Beast! We're under attack! The skipper's been badly injured!" Beast says, "Attacked by whom?" "I don't know, but they're flying the skull and crossbones!" "Pirates? In these waters? Okay, everyone stay below deck for your own safety. Beauty, you too." Beauty protests. "No, I'm coming with you!" (roars) "No, stay here!" says Beast.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I can deal with pirates! I've dealt with pirates before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "No, I can't risk your lives, you're my paying customers. Please stay below deck." He darts upstairs with the sailor.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I think this is part of the thing. I think we can also date the pirates. This is awesome!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Anyone interferes with the chance that I might find love tonight, they shall meet the end of my bloody scepter! I am half-raging. I'm not quite there yet.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: How hot are these pirates?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You haven't seen any pirates yet.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I can deal with pirates.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: What if they're dead pirates?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Ooh, even better!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: So hot!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Seeing Beauty standing alone, worried about her husband, I approach. Hey, do you currently love anyone and would you be interested in loving someone new?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I'm bleeding and cut."

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Oh, I'm sorry. I pull some of my stuffing out of my hip and I apply it to the cut on her head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Oh, actually, that kind of feels okay." Roll a medicine check.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Eight plus two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so ten. Yeah, that feels good. It blots out some of the blood and he feels weirdly better.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'm super absorbent!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Thank you, strange man, I--"

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Give it back when you're done, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "It's soaked in blood. Are you sure?"

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Yeah, I'm very moist inside.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I hope you don't get infected.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Will we all be exchanging liquids tonight?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'm down!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Another shot fires. A cannon blasts through the side of the hull into the banquet hall, splintering chairs and tables. Hold on-- yes, it hits and kills Hansel.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Hansel, no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hansel is dead.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: That was a small man that I had my heart set on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The cannon takes his head clean off.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Seeing Gretel standing alone near Hansel, I approach. Hey, do you currently love anyone and would you be open to loving someone new?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's just screaming.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I pull aside Scarecrow and say: Let me teach you something about when it's appropriate to talk to a woman.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay, cool! When is it appropriate?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Not when her brother just died in front of her eyes.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm starting to think these pirates aren't very sexy, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Princess and the Pea is screaming bloody murder, she hasn't been hurt or anything, she's just overreacting. The rest of the ice sculptures all smash to the floor. You notice the Hunchback of Notre Dame, this kindly old man, has fallen to the floor. He's writhing in pain.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Is he smaller than the average person?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's foaming at the mouth, convulsing, he seems to be having some sort of medical attention.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I go up to him and shake him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shake him? Okay, it does nothing. He is still convulsing violently.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I slap him. Wake up! You might have been a good suitor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That does not seem to help him at all. He's definitely having a heart attack.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Can we try a medicine check on him? CPR? I would love to CPR him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you proficient in medicine?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: No! But I'm crazy, so-- (laughter)

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I step up and say: Hey, I'm not a healer, but do we have one here?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I've been told that my songs are very soothing, so I would love to use my Healing Word on this convulsing man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, what would you like to say to him to--

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I hold him to my bosom as he listens.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: And I come in and I join the embrace, I'm like: Hey buddy, hang in there, it's all going to be okay. (singing) Here's my song for you, a little dying man, it's going to be okay. Just improvising here, you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, no, that's great! The Hunchback of Notre Dame sort of comes to again suddenly, hearing the sweet, kindly music of Peter Pan and feeling the warmth of a bosom pressed against his face.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Make that two bosoms.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He starts babbling to you in French, he speaks no English. But it seems that he is very grateful and now very much alive again.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, you know what, it would have been great if someone hadn't talked me out of my Comprehend Languages spell, I really could have had something here.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Je parle français, en fait, et ça suffit que--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (French accent) "Oh, shit. Oů est l'autobus? Dans la rue de Victor Hugo?" He seems like he's in frail health, he can't talk very much. He kind of passes out. It seems like you should leave him alone for a second.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Until a plan is organized, I lay under him, to give him a soft place to rest.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I think that we all want to seduce this Hunchback.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I come over and tap Peter on the shoulder.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Did you see me do that? I did that. It was really hot.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: We know how to deal with pirates. Can we maybe deal with this situation, because we both want to have a nice cruise, and then we can go back to ignoring each other on this very nice cruise.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Peter, I'd like to say, I might be the Queen of Hearts, but you might be the king. You saved him from his heart attack, you see. You see? Do you see what I said?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I do. I see what you're laying down there, and I like it. You know, I love a funny woman.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: If you want a tiny man, he's literally a child. Always.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That's untrue. I'm uncomfortable with that implication.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: H, make a perception check. Roll a d20.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay. Perception. 12 plus two, 14.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Out of the side of your eye, in the melee, through the hole in the hull that was caused by the cannon fire, you see the edge of a pirate ship through some cannon smoke out there.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I go: Oh, fuck! And I let the hunchback drop on the floor and I go over to look.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Peering out the hole in the wall, you can see a sleek black cutlass. Is that what they're called? A sleek black pirate ship moving around.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That is not a cutlass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A cutlass is a sword. No, a schooner! I don't know anything about boats!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: It's called The Cutlass.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Tonight Sam's going to be laying in his bed with nightmares of boats and not knowing what they're called, just going by.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know schooner, and that's it.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: The name of the ship is The Cutlass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it. Also, Goldilocks, roll a perception check.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's enough. A bunch of ice sculptures have broken, there's lots of water on the floor, but mixed with the ice, you feel warm seawater on your feet, and realize that your ship is taking on water.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Put your hands on me, Hatter!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Hey, I think that warm water is leaking into our ship, although I'm happy to know that we're in the Caribbean! This is not the Titanic!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Yes, always looking for a positive edge!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: We should get some floaties and continue the party!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: So it's like going down in a jacuzzi!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: They're about to shoot us again!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I want to go get a look at this pirate ship. Can I do that? And roll a perception check for that.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to check it out, too.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I got a 22.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I got the exact same.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Hey, okay, just let me have this. Come on, man. Come on.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Peering right over your shoulder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's an imposing pirate vessel with black sails, dark wood, sleek and sturdy with rails made of human bone.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: What the fuck!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's got a dozen brass cannons ringing the hull and below decks. Emblazoned on the bow are the words, "The Jolly Roger." Peter and Wendy, you both recognize this ship instantly as belonging to Captain Hook.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: My other ex!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: He does not sound very jolly to me.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: You know, he's not, actually.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Yeah, what happened with you two? I don't want to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wendy, what did you roll for perception?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I got 22 also.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so Wendy, through the smoke and the chaos, you notice that the pirates running around on the other vessel are much smaller than you expected. You recognize them as Tootles, Slightly, Nibs, Curly, and the Twins. It is the Lost Boys, and they are preparing to shoot again. What would you like to do?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: This is yours. Those are yours.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh my God, oh! My friends! Do they like me? I don't remember. I should go talk to them.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: No, you probably abandoned them in a Chili's or something.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: They still want to be my friends. I'm going to go talk to them. Okay. How do I get over there? Flying. Totally.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The hole that the cannon made is about yea big.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm a little larger than that. Not a lot larger, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Would you like to try to squeeze through the hole?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Maybe I'll-- hmm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You hear more screams of pain now coming from above and people running on deck. You can hear things rolling above you.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm going to go up there, maybe, where that stuff is.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: We should all go up there!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Hey, let's go up where the water is not!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: And before we do anything to your friends, are they all very small?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: They're very small.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Oh, my heart.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: They're literally children.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: We don't know how the Neverland magic is working. They might be children. I am not a child, I myself. I just want to make that super clear.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I shift in next to the Mad Hatter, and I go: Let's get up there! And also, while we go, do you love anyone and are you open to loving someone new?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: And while we go up the stairs: Tell me more about your fetishes. Because you've got some really interesting things.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I like being the mommy.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Are there other instruments, like a scepter?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I have a whip! I have a whip!

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I have a whip.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Oh, do you?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: A magical whip, yeah. Listen, don't get into a relationship where they want you to be their mom. That is my advice to you.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I would like to be in a relationship with someone who wants to be my mom. I'm going to go and talk to these pirates, but also, call me.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Yes, I'm not going anywhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Peter Pan dashes in his slight way across the dance hall to the door.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Are there stairs?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The door is locked.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: That son of a bitch!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Not on my watch! And I'm going to scepter my way through the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Roll for an attack.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I think it's time to rage. So yeah, that's the last of it. Nothing stands between me and at least ten tiny men! I get advantage if I'm raging.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. You used your bonus action to rage, now you're raging and you get advantage, I believe, on strength-based. Yeah.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Okay, so that's even better. How about a 16?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. You definitely hit the door. Roll for damage.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Okay, solid eight on an eight, so that's 13.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. The door splinters open and is knocked clean off of its hinges. You all see the queen exhibit a ferocious amount of anger towards this door, and it explodes into splinters. The path is clear. You may climb the stairs to the deck.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I am as rock hard as a man with no blood can be.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I stand there going: Yes, go! If I can let them go before me, I just want to relish in my glory.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: And you said I was mad.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: We're coming back to this. I'm going up there now, but we're coming back to this.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Just a little flirty nothing.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I'm sorry, I'm raging. I will elbow that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Roll for an attack.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I'm raging, I can't-- I'm in a frenzy.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: You can't control yourself.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Oh, well. That's advantage, so how's a-- oh, even worse. A nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That does not hit. She tries to elbow you, but you, having no bones, just noodle your way away.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I totally take it as a sign. I go (goofy giggle) and I keep going.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I run out the door, but right through her legs, right under her skirt because I am a wee man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: An acrobatics check? 18 plus three, 21.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You do a risky business slide right between her legs.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Looking up as I go through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he see anything?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Do I have to roll for that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what she's wearing under there.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I didn't think about this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you wearing bloomers?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I am not. I'm wearing nothing. I'm wearing absolutely nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. So you see what you see.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I see what I see. That's my secret, y'all!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Are you going to head up the stairs, Yuri?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, let's get this out.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: What's happening? I don't know this game!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Neither do I! This is a crudely drawn map that I drew because I'm a crude drawer.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I feel like I was there. Like, the atmosphere is really good. You did a really good job on this map.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, Mad Hatter's first.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I love these long blue birds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys are coming up this hatch in the middle. Mad Hatter will be first. Who's next?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Peter Pan is next.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh, I'm so cute!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll say Wendy is close behind. The Queen is still downstairs, right, letting them all go? And then we'll say Scarecrow. This is Goldilocks, come out behind, and you guys are looking, and you've seen already, you know it's there. This is the pirate vessel coming around for another attack.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Those are the Lost Boys. Your men.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: They're tiny. They're so tiny.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll roll for the boys. Okay, okay.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I have a 16.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I am an eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, hold on. Yup, 16. Eight. Yes, keep going. Wendy.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I'm an 11.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I am a four.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I am also a four. I thought I was certainly going to be the lowest, but no.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Good job, everybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Oh my God, why do I always do this to myself? I have 12 people to keep track of! Okay, here we go. So who goes first?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: It would be me, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, but you were last to come up the staircase. You will get to go this round, but because you've never played D&D before, I'm going to let someone else go first.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Oh, come on, I've got a great opening move!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, great! Then you know what? Go for it! If you want to do it.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: So how far is it to the edge of this ship?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These squares are all five feet, so you are standing about 30 feet from the edge.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay. I move right to the edge of the boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's super fast when he moves, because he's got these noodle legs.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay. And the first thing I do is I menace this motherfucker right at the edge over here, across the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to use your menacing action to try and intimidate?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I want to send some fear out there before this shit gets started.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold on. Let me look. Where's your fucking character sheet?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Isn't it intimidation?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got to roll for it, for sure, so roll-- Wait, no, it might be--

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Menacing. Instead of attacking, you can scare one creature, intimidate versus insight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so it's intimidate versus insight. Yes, you're right. So roll your d20, add plus five I think.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: So I get 25.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit, he's done. He rolled a one, so he is scared of you and on his turn he will probably run away from you.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay. And to be out of the cannon blast, I'll move two--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to put this on him, so we know that he is now intimidated.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: And then, to be not totally in the blast radius, I'll move back ten feet, so two spaces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was a good first-ever attack! Good job, H!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Hey, thanks for the claps, you guys.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Good scarecrow, man.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Oh! I forgot one thing. I can un-sew a part of my head when I menace to show the molding hay inside of my skull. And then I quickly stitch it up and put my branded hat back on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. So yes, Tootles is scared out of his mind. He's shaking in his boots. And he's a little kid, too, so you just scared the shit out of a little kid by showing him your monstrous moist insides.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Don't try to make me feel bad about this! I love it!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: That was my strategy later! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to use a sling and try to hit the closest. Nibs is this one, by the way. He's trying to hit the closest person to him, which is Scarecrow. He rolled a 13. What's your AC? What's your armor class?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hits, right?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Yeah, baby.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, thank you. I don't know nothing. He hits you with three points of damage!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Take it!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Do I write this down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Noelle, show him his hit points.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Your hit points are here. You have 23.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Goldilocks, you're up!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: So the farthest I can move to get close to them is-- So I'll use my movement and get as close to them as possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can get right up to the edge of the ship.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: So my Thunderwave is only in a 15-foot cube, but they're not in it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You would not be able to hit any of them with Thunderwave.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Now that I'm here facing them--

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I feel like Thunderwave has a range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 15 feet from self.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: So it's not going to get them.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Does it have to land on the square, or is it the distance in between? Because if you went diagonally you could go--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It would not do it!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay. I don't know anything; I'm just asking.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: No, Scarecrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have anything? If you cannot strike or use your action to attack, you can also hold your action, and say, "I hold my action until they are in range."

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to hold my action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so you're going to attack them when they get closer. All right, great. That ends your turn. Next up is Tootles! So he is crying. Tears are streaming down Tootles' face. He turns and runs, runs in fear trying to get as far away from you as possible. He's freaked out.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: To clarify, are they kids? Are they children? Because we're adults.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're the Lost Boys, straight from Neverland.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: We're definitely adults, though, right?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Peter Pan is definitely over 18 years old?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For sure, yes.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: But the Lost Boys are children.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Filthy dirty. Wild hair and eyes with ripped clothing, no shoes to speak of. Some of them are missing teeth.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay. So where's the closest area that I can get to that has some barrels, a stack of barrels, anything that I can go behind but be fairly close?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me paint a picture for you. Actually, roll a perception check, because you just came out on this.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Not great, 11.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The helm?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Helm makes sense. We'll call it a helm and get torn apart by boat enthusiasts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a raised platform. There are some lockers over here, boxes and crates over here. You also seem to notice there are two ballistae that can fire things, and there are two cannons over here.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: So how far away am I from this ballista?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are, it looks like, 35-ish feet from this one, and maybe a little less to that one. 30 feet, maybe.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: So what's this red thing here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That, you notice, is a gangplank. That's what they use to load and unload the ship at port. It's a long ladder, very long, and it unfolds to about 15 feet long.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I don't see much of a use for that.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: You don't usually get to the gangplank until later in the night. Oh, that's right, I'm sorry, that was something totally different. Sorry.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Oh, my.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Your enjoyment of that joke was as good, if not better than, the joke.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Can I make it to this mast nearby the ballista?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you can swing around to here.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm going to go over there and kind of hide behind it, and I'm going to shoot a Message cantrip at the closest boy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. That, I believe, is Slightly. Yes, Slightly.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay, so I shoot a Message cantrip. I'm like: Yo, dude. What the fuck? Like, shrug emoji, fire emoji, explosion emoji, skull and crossbones emoji. It's me, Peter, by the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So he hears, in his ears, magically, Peter's voice saying to him, "what gives, what's going "on?" And he replies to you, because he can do that with Message, right? Yeah. Not Massage. He replies by saying-- You hear in your ear, "If we can't have Wendy, no one can!"

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh, fuck!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Anything else you'd like to do for your turn?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Can I do anything else for my turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Bonus action or something?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I think you can say something.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I did with my Message.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Well, that's your turn. It'll go to twin number two, who doesn't have a name. He's going to roll very well and do his sling at you, Goldilocks. This is a-- ooh, it's a 20. It definitely hits. And it hits with five points of damage. Sorry, lady.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I guess we can't use our Shield again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, you can use Shield. As a reaction, right?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it once per-- What's it say?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Oh, wait, I'm not going to use my Shield, because then I can't use my Thunderwave, right? I can only use three per day, and I don't know how long this night is going to go, so I will take damage so I can kill them later.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Are you saying all this in character?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: That's what I'm doing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mark five points off your health.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I thought I was crazy. What is she talking about?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Twin number two is going to run down to this cannon and continue to load it. That brings us to-- Peter went already, right? So now it's all the fours. Wendy, Queen, and the Hatter. Who wants to go first?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's move this along. The ship has now come closer and moved around to here. They're preparing to fire.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Does Goldilocks get her prepared action?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! Yes, they are now within range. Thank you, fellow DM. Go ahead and do your attack. What was your attack?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: It was the Thunderwave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And who would you like to target?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you can probably hit both of these fellows.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I mean, 15 feet. Where is that guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a 15-foot cube, so--

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: What about this back one here? Starting from there? I mean, I feel bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't feel bad. They're children.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Can I try talking to them first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you can't talk to them because you were holding your action. This is all you can do.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: All right. I'll Thunderwave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Out of Goldilocks, she opens her mouth and a loud, thunderous sound cracks out of her mouth, making a blast of thunder that hurts everybody's ears.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: What the fuck are you doing, you're destroying our love boat cruise!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's piercing, and they roll. Fail. One of them succeeds, one of them fails. Thunderwave is what, 2d8? Is that right?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Yeah, 2d8.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So roll 2d8. Do that. Roll it again. You're going to add these together.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so that's four points of damage.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I'm going to use my Lucky and re-roll. I get lucky three times per day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. You can re-roll one of those.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Two again!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So they both take four points of damage and this one is sent ten feet back. All right, excellent job. Let me mark off their damage. Okay, next is Curly. Right, he's the one who hasn't gone? Have they all?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Curly hasn't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's this one, right? Shit. I can't remember, they all look alike! He's going to roll and attack you, Goldilocks, because you just attacked one of his friends.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: You should have given them-- it's like anime rules. Everybody needs a different color hair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't make these god damn minis!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: They're all basically drawn the same, so someone's got half a face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's just rolled a 19, he hits you.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Yeah, I use my Shield now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You do. That's plus five to AC, right? So he does not hit. He slings a rock at you. It barely misses you and clatters across the deck of the ship. You are fine. Queen of Hearts and Hatter have to go. Have you gone yet? How did I skip Wendy? Oh, okay.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: They're all equally shitty at rolling.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Thank you. Thank you.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: It sounds like there's so much happening up there! I run up the stairs, look around and see where all the action is. If I can get to at least the edge of the boat, I'm at 30-foot speed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You took ten feet to get up there, so you can get right about there.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Okay, awesome. I yell at them: Mommy's home!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As soon as you say "Mommy's home," the closest one to you, Nibs, smiles, and says, "Mommy?"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Goldilocks mutters: This is fucked up.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: This is fucked up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As you're all on deck now, you notice the chaos and carnage around you. Your vessel is not designed for fighting and has suffered badly. Two of its three masts are broken. The deck is riddled with holes. It's on fire in one place.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Am I in the fire?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will draw you fire. Where is it? Ah! Where's my pens? Fuck it. This is on fire over here. This is fire. This mast is gone. This mast is damaged.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Just really immerse us in the situation.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh, wow!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: The water's on fire!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Is Scarecrow freaking out now, because fire?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Most of the crew is injured or dead. There's a dead guy over here. There's a dead guy over here. There's a dead guy right here.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: All the knives and forks from Beauty and the Beast--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Are Beauty and the Beast alive?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't see-- Actually, roll a perception check.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I want to look for the Beast! I got a one, I don't see him!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, anyone else want to take a look?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: You blink while you look.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You do not see the Beast.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I did forget to open my eyes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You, Goldilocks, do notice that there's a lifeboat right here, but it has been severely damaged in the attack. There is no lifeboat right there. Some of the crew had light weapons. They're scattered around the ground. There's also these weapon lockers over here that have different things in them. Okay, top of the round.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: These two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, sorry, you haven't gone yet! Sorry, I keep skipping you. Go ahead, go ahead.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Do you have something?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Go, go, go.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Wendy steps forward, seeing the Lost Boys and rolling her eyes, especially at the one who was like "Mom!" And she's like, let me see if I can remember how to do this. And she turns into a giant eagle!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit. That is so cool.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: She spreads massive wings. She's a large beast, which is very big. Maybe not quite as big as a dragon, but--

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I've never been less attracted to you!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: An eagle as big as a dragon?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: It's a big eagle, and she flaps over. She's trying to basically grab the boy who's on the cannon and put him into the water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you can fly over there. I don't think that you can also grab. You can get over there and turn into--

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: It's an action, you're right. Yeah, totally.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Their reaction to this should be shitting their pants.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I use my action to turn into a huge eagle and hover over the boat, my wings blowing air in everybody's faces.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: You're doing so good, Sam! This is awesome! (exclamations)

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I really want one of those birds that you can balance on your finger, and I could just hold it.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh, no, she's dead now.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I'm drowning.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: She's fine again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're floating above them. Probably not that high either, but whatever. It's done. Okay, that's your action and your movement. Are you good?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: That's it. That's all I got.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I think I might be able to do it from where I am, but if not, I might be able to get closer. I would like to try to Sleep some of them. Because that's what I do. I'm boring. I'm going to sing them a lullaby, and Sleep as many as I can. It's 90 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely, sure. Yeah, go ahead and roll, what is it, 5d8? To find out how many hit points of sleep you cause? Is that how it works? Shit.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Where are my d8s at?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yuri is portraying a character tonight called The Hatter. He's not portraying a character called anything other than The Hatter, which would be property of Disney.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I wouldn't know of any other character known as the Hatter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's the crazy hat.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: He's the goofball cap-wearer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Because we're all on the S.S. Public Domain, guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 24 points of hit points. You can pick four of those guys to Sleep.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: How about the four that are closest to me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are you? You haven't moved, so that's these four?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Me, the person, who is not the Hatter, but who is also the Hatter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So they all fall asleep. That's how sleep works, there's no save.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Fucking fantastic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right? That's how that works?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Sure! Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're all within 20 feet of each other. I think that's how it works. I don't care. That's how it works! Great! Okay, that was amazing, Hatter. That was amazing.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Thank you. Sometimes--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I know. I am attracted to all of you.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I didn't even have to use Charm Person on you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, you notice that four of the Lost Boys get all sleepy-eyed and curl up into a little fetal position and go to sleep. Night-night time.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: A tiny man who is good with children!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. That brings us to the top of the round, right? No one is awake to fire their cannons, so they do not. But the one who is left, who's actually up a bit, on lookout. He's one of the twins. He yells to you, Wendy, "Wendy, Mama, we miss you! Come back to Neverland! Ever since you "and Peter broke up, we've nobody to take care of us! We don't know how to cook, bathe, brush our "teeth! We're getting sick! Curly has the runs!" You also notice that above the twin, on that mast, is Captain Hook's severed head, stuck to the top of the mast. A gruesome effigy of the madness that has befallen the boys. The ship is still moving a bit. It's drifting, because the guy who was piloting it is now asleep. Just then, you realize that your ship is starting to list severely to one side. The waterline has shifted. One of the injured sailors calls out, "Oh, Gods, we're "sinking!" What would you like to do? We're at the top of the round. It's Scarecrow's turn.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Remember when you said you were super absorbent?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: That's a good point. I think we've got to take this fucking ship. Most of them are either scared or sleeping, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay, I have an action, an attack, and 40 feet of movement, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Correct. You can jump. You can use your action not just to attack, but you can do things, use objects.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay. So this is 15 feet, this ladder?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
