lines.text: So I'm going to hit this ladder, shove it straight out, and try to get it to briefly dock onto the other ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Roll a strength check.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Let's see. 16 plus two, 18.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuck yeah. You knock it, and it goes (clatter). It's stretching, it's skidding across their deck, because their ship is still moving a little bit in relation to yours, but there is a temporary bridge there that you can use.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: You are two for two for applause on your D&D turns.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay, and so I want to get this guy out of commission, so I use my movement to move right to the ledge of their ship. I cross the bridge and I land right on the bridge of their ship, and I look up at the man at the top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a boy. He's a tiny child.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: The boy in the crow's nest. And I stick my fingers in my mesh face and I pull it sideways and I scream up at him, and I use my menace again on him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Great. That is an action. You roll versus insight.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: 12 plus five, 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17. He rolls a natural 20. You try to make him go berserk, and he looks down at you, but through the cannon smoke and the chaos, he can't even really get a good glimpse of you, so it just fails.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: There is a severed head on the mast, too.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Yeah, that's a good point.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I can't feel anything anymore!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: My scary mask face isn't worse.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: The dude's seen some shit.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Also, the drawing of my character is the sweetest fucking guy you've ever seen.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh, man, I sure wish that I was watching this right now, so I could see that. That must be so great.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Well, maybe someday you'll be able to look it up. In order to make it harder for this guy to attack me, I'm going to move right up against the pole. I'm going to move pressed up against it so the ability for him to shoot something down at me is a tough angle.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: We're still being romantic in this. You just pressed yourself up against his pole!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'll fuck anything, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have another platform, but-- Oh, Jesus. Oh, forget it. Just imagine he's up a bit.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh, wait!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look at that! What on Earth?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Is that high enough?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, ma'am. Okay, that's your turn, Scarecrow. Next is Goldilocks.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I am so impressed by a guy who takes charge even though he has no idea what he's doing and ends up being really, really sweet to the rest of us, so we're going to go in. We're going to move as close as we can to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The bridge?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Yeah. I assume I don't have my weapons on me, I wasn't carrying them in the bar?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action to summon my crossbow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, great. So out of nowhere, a crossbow appears in Goldilocks' hand.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Woo! Got my crossbow. Going to aim it up at the--

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Child?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: We're not aiming to kill, we're just aiming to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As you aim, you notice that this one also has glasses.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Oh, no!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Kill him. Kill him. He'll never see it coming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Little parted hair, right in the middle.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: But I won't kill him with my crossbow, because my damage is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's find out. Shoot away.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Cool. So I'm going to take this one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll a d20, add your attack bonus.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Okay, so it's a 19. Plus four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. So roll for damage. That definitely hits.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Well, it'll probably be a two again, so we'll see. It's a two! I think this one's screwed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two plus something?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Two plus two is four. Is that enough? I don't want to kill him anyway. It's okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And he rolled very well. He is no longer frightened of you, Scarecrow, and so he is going to turn around and come back towards you, Scarecrow.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: The one on top is injured.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He is going to shoot back down at you, Goldilocks, because you're right there, and he rolled a 12 to hit.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Does my Shield last in all of this combat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One round. We're at the top of the second round, so no, it doesn't. He rolled a 12. Did he hit you? With your AC of--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the end of their turn. Peter Pan, you are up.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to run. How far am I from the edge of the ship?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From this edge of the ship, you're about 20 feet. And from way over there, I don't know, 50?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: From the edge of the-- The one right there.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to take a big running start, and I'm going to use my Jump spell to leap onto the other ship. It's a long jump, I think I can go pretty far, up to 40 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so we see in slow motion, Peter Pan, it almost looks like flying. He takes off into the air, does this move, looks back at you guys to make sure you're watching, does a little bit of a flip and lands. Three-point landing, super cool, on the deck of the ship.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay, so who's this child who's passed out near me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's either Nibs or the first twin.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm going to tie that one up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, I have rope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold on one second, I'm looking up Sleep. When does it break?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: A minute. It's been significantly less than that.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: If they get shaken awake or attacked.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I very, very gently--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wendy or the Queen or the Hatter. Who wants to go?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Is the boat still moving?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The boat is still moving, yes, but ever so slightly. The bridge seems to have slowed it down a little bit.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I'm still raging, and I see the enemy in sight, and I run forward and attack. Melee attack the mast that the tiny man is standing on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to hit the mast.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Yes! Get on down here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's your movement?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: It's 30.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can get to the mast, and you hit it hard.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Come here! I said Mommy's home! Come give me a hug! I'm going to do two attacks because I can bony action.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Whoa, whoa!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I can frenzy and I get a bonus action. I can take a melee attack as my bonus action.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Boner action.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Okay, and they're both at advantage, so 19 and 16. The lowest one would be a 21 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, that hits the mast.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Okay, so I have two hits that hit, and that's a 12 damage and another 12 damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wow. That's 24 points of damage to the mast. What are you hacking with?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: My scepter!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So the scepter is causing huge chunks of wood to fly out of the mast. The whole thing is shaking. It does not collapse. Twin number two up there at the top gets shaken off of the top but manages to grab on with his natural 20 and is holding with his-- He's got a bolt sticking out of this arm and with this arm he's holding on. He is still up there. He did not fall off.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: You preventer of love.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: That is a resilient child.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Can I flap over and grab him, not attacking for damage, but just yank him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, like a grapple? All right, So Wendy-bird flies over and grabs the child. Roll for a grapple.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Can he get disadvantage? Because he's dangling?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course. He's got one arm and he's using the other to hold on.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Damn, I only got a nine. I am very strong, though.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Do you want to borrow some dice?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I got nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what, you roll with advantage instead of him rolling with disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. That's enough. He's like this. You're a giant eagle. You pick him up. You have him in your claws but you're not causing him any damage, right?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: No, I've just got him in a grip. And then I'm going to go land on the prow of the boat.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Why don't you go up there and call it a ship the way it's supposed to be called? There are thousands of people out there going, "It's not a boat, it's a ship!"

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Slightly to port, the port side. And I sort of protect him with my claws, so that the Queen can't get him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Hatter? The Crazy Hatter, what would you like to do?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I would like to run across the gangplank, because it seems like the ship I'm on sucks.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I like how none of us are checking to see if these dudes are alive.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: No, they're fine. They're fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This guy's on fire.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Probably dead.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: There's a lot of other people on this cruise, somewhere. They stayed below decks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's over here, and you can also see this guy in the eagle's claws.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I will cast a Firebolt at the guy on deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, yes, you can just see. Go ahead and cast your Firebolt. That's what you add to your roll, spell attack bonus.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: 17 plus four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You hit him for sure. Roll your damage.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: It's a d10. A six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That guy dead.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I killed a child, guys! With fire!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A bolt of fire comes out of the Mad Hatter's body. Hand? Out of his boutonniere a bolt of fire streaks across the ship, striking the child dead in the heart. He looks stunned for a second and then collapses, dead, or at least severely unconscious right there.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Can I do a reaction here based on the fact that he just shot fire by a giant stack of hay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. What reaction?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I turn to the Hatter and go: What the fuck, man?! What the fuck are you thinking?! Do you not know any non-flammable spells?! I'm in the line of fire, dude, I thought we were cool!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I squirt water out of my boutonniere on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was the Hatter. Queen of Hearts, you've gone. Wendy's gone. Everyone's gone, it's back to the top of the round. Scarecrow, it's your move, but all of them are sleeping, dead, or incapacitated. You notice that this ship is starting to move away and the bridge is starting to collapse. You probably have a second or two before the bridge falls and you fall into the water. Scarecrow, what would you like to do? Oh, you're already on the ship. You're okay.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: There's only a second or two left, I'm pretty strong. Yeah. I'm going to try to, in one motion, swing this whole wooden ladder onto the boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You run over to the gangplank and pull as hard as you can, trying to get your friends on board the ship with you. Roll for strength.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You definitely pull it, but it gets to about there and then falls into the water. Goldilocks and the Hatter, roll dexterity saves. Is that a cricket in the studio?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Always good for a sound stage.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: What'd you get?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Eight plus three. 11.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: 17 plus two is 19.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Goldilocks holds on easily to the gangplank and watches as the Hatter slides by her.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: That's what I get for killing a child!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Can I reach out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You needed to hold on for yourself. I'll say you can reach out with your foot and Hatter, you can make one more acrobatics check to see if you can grab onto the foot.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Nope! You don't even to need to know what I rolled!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Her slipper has salt water on it, your hand slides off and you are now in the water.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: No!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Guys, it's the Caribbean, so don't cry for me too badly. This is balmy.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I get one action and one attack, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You get one action and you get a bonus action where you can hit someone with your hand because you're a monk.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: But that doesn't help.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Sorry, dude, trying to help!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I appreciate it, man, I do.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Are we still in initiative?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are still in initiative because there's a guy. It is not his turn, it's Goldilocks' turn.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I wasn't ever feeling like I wanted to be a mom, but upon seeing a child get killed, my maternal instincts kick in and I'm like: You're a horrible human being! Or Hatter of the crazy variety. And so I don't know if I want to save you.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Is there any way to heal the dead kid?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You would have to climb back onto the ship first.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to climb back onto the ship first. I'm going to approach the kid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't have any. You can say nice things to him.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I just want to talk to the dead kid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can use your dash action to get all the way to the kid, and now you can talk to him.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: The Crazy Hatter's a real dick. Definitely not going to date him, don't worry. I'll try to turn as many women as I know against him. You should've had a better life and got education and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So as you say all this to this young child you see out of the corner of his eyes blood is dripping out of his eyes because he is super dead.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Are you alive? No? Oh, I don't have great charisma or anything either so I can't, that's it, I'm done. I keep muttering to the child to try--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's your strength, Wendy?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Right now, it's 16.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think he breaks your grapple.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: He wiggled his way free.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah! He's free and going to run away.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I'm distracted by the murdered child that I know and is my friend--

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: You guys say what you want but that one child is going to kill all of us!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As that child runs away, he runs right past Goldilocks. Goldilocks, as he is crossing in front of you, you have an attack of opportunity. You can hit him as he goes. If you'd like to, or grab him.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: You can choose to deal subdual damage which knocks him unconscious

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Yeah. I would like to not kill the child that would definitely--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, roll for an attack!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: We're getting so much shit for just killing one,

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As he runs by, (panicked breathing) he gets hit in the back of the head, falls down also unconscious.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: And I say: It's safer for you this way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Down but not dead!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: The Hatter can't get you now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At this point the gangplank has fallen away, the ship is still moving away. That was Goldilocks. Peter's turn? Wait, did we do Peter?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I haven't gone yet. No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, go for it, Peter.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Is there a life preserver or anything near by, or some rope?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's definitely rope. There's the main sheet is dangling down from the mast. There's also coils of rope on the floor that you can get.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm going to get some of those coils of rope and I'm going to toss it to The Hatter. And I'm going to use my bardic inspiration to give him 1d6 to any ability check he might try to make.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. So Peter Pan either speaks, or sings, or plays--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: (singing) Hang on dude, I got you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The words are so inspiring that you get an extra d6 dice that you can add on to your next roll-- Because you feel so inspired by Peter Pan's words.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I know I'm in the water treading water, but can I cast a spell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, it is now your turn, and yes you have an action, a movement, and a bonus action.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Misty Step is actually a bonus action. Can I use my bonus action first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: And I'm closer than 30 feet away. So I would like to Misty Step aboard the deck. Which is sort of like the Electric Slide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So before Peter Pan finishes his words of inspiration. Poof. Mad Hat-- I'm sorry, The Hatter is standing right next to Peter--

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: We're all going to jail before the end of the night!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Looking thankfully, gratefully, into Peter Pan's eyes--

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Mickey fucking kicks through this right over here. Oh! I said Mickey--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Shh! Don't let the Mouse hear you!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Just a guy I know named Mickey.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Stop being so

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: (laughing) He bursts through this wall with a gun.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Do I have time to get over to the kid whose life is draining away? That's clear across the ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did cause it so you know that he is suffering. You don't have time to get all the-- Yeah, we're out of initiative now, the fight is over--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I mean, he could have six extra points if he wanted them. Whatever! It's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, that's right. So, yes, things are calm, everyone is either asleep or dead, so you can take a couple of turns and walk over there.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: So I go over to where the kid is lying and sing him a lullaby--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a particular spell attached to that lullaby or is it just a nice song?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I wish I had healing abilities. It's just a song to help--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: If we're out of initiative, would you consider this a short rest?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys can take a short rest. Short rest would be like 20 or 25 minutes of-- Yes, Molly?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Oh, sorry. Wendy, as you're getting pulled out of the water and going over to the kid, she turns out of eagle form and runs over to the kid who got killed. As you're singing a lullaby, she shoulders you aside.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: (singing) Down in the wind-- (yells)

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: And she leans down and picks up the kid and casts Cure Wounds on him. I don't know if that will do anything because he's dead but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Cure Wounds is what? 1d8 plus three or something like that?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: 1d8 plus spellcasting ability.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, he's dead.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Well, I'll just give it a shot, you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just roll to see if luck shines on you.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: That's a nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The kid coughs.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Whoa. Somebody do CPR!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And passes out again.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay, is this a short rest or not?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A short rest is 25 minutes long.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Well, we could take some time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. He's very faintly breathing. His pulse is almost at a standstill. Someone else would have to do something very quickly in order to save him.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Can anyone act here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyone can act, yes. We're out of battle.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I start playing my pan pipes, beautifully, and seeing as it is a short rest, any friends that hear my performance, they regain 1d6 HP.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. So you're playing a jaunty ditty or a beautiful ballad?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Like a really poignant tune.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. So it's Enya or something.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Really inspiring.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So why don't you roll a d6--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh, I do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And everyone within earshot regains four hit points because of the beauty of the pan flute

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Thank you very much!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, Nibs-- Wait, no, was this Slightly or Nibs?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I just made it up. I just made one up--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Slightly was the dead one! Yeah, no, this is Slightly.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: All right, I'm taking off, you guys! Nice seeing everyone!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Blood still covers his face. You also notice that he stinks, all these sleeping boys have the worst body odor. They are unkempt, wild eyed. The crisis is averted. Calm settles over the ship--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Can I just tie up any of the other boys who are sleeping real quick? I just tie them all to the mast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. They're all tied to the mast, all in a circle, just like the Peter Pan book.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: What the hell are you guys doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to wake them up?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I think they wake up after a minute.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes! So a minute has passed, they all come to, they're all tied up.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: What the hell are you guys doing?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "What are we doing? What are you doing? Why did you two break up?"

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: It's been like eight years!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I know, but in Neverland time moves differently! We never grow up! We just want a "mama--"

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: These are-- I can't. It's your turn to shine. I cannot be a mother to these smelly stupid idiot children anymore!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Well, look here.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Here's your new mom!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Excuse me? I do in a relationship want to be the mommy-- Are any of you interested in having a sexual relationship with me? (laughter)

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I grab her and pull her back. Yeah, I put my hand over your mouth--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One of the kids starts crying.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I say, listen, I don't know what your problem is--

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Mothership mother. This is not the Jolly Roger anymore, it is the Mothership! (laughter)

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I say, Get away from the Mothership!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I'm not doing anything wrong here!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I say, they're 12!

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: They're very small and very smelly. They're very stupid--

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Ugh! I can't, I'm an adult person.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay. Okay, guys. Guys, what's going on? Why are you doing this? What happened, man?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "We need someone to take care of us, and ever since you broke up, Neverland's turned to shite."

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Neverland? Is this a kingdom I could acquire?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "You have to believe to get there."

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I don't know--

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: So you guys need a dad? Because I think I'd make a great dad!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (crying) "You killed our friend!"

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: He's alive again, all right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Oh, that's right."

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Look, Wendy and I are like wild horses, we have to go our separate ways. But if she wanted to get back together, you know, I would be okay with that. But if not, I would also be okay with that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Are you saying that there's a chance you might be able to get back together?"

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Look, I have lots of other options--

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Our relationship fell apart because we had seven tiny, grubby children hanging on to us at all times. I'm not ready to be a mom!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "So it was our fault?" (crying)

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Yes, it was!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I interject and say: hey, I think that's a really bad foundation for six or seven kids, however many were on this boat--

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I keep losing track.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: On a side note, let's direct our attention elsewhere. I want to roll a perception check, to see if-- I feel like the lifeboat was taken by someone who might've known this attack was coming. So I roll a 16--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's great. As you glance back to the old S.S. Public Domain, you catch the final glimpses of the stern of it as it vanishes beneath the water, sunken.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Wow, that means a lot of people died!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You also notice that the helm of the Jolly Roger is spinning back and forth, pilotless. Your vessel is drifting aimlessly in the water. You have no direction. What would you like to do?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I want to go drive it, at the lifeboat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So Peter's going to go up to the helm. Take it and roll a survival check, please.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Can I get advantage, since I've probably steered a boat before?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, you've stolen-- Advantage, why not?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, that's fine. I don't do it, probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, what did you roll?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That is a nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's it. You are going straight.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I got this. Don't worry, guys.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I want to check out the captain's quarters. I walk over to the door to the captain's quarters and I open it. I do a fucking look-around check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do an investigation check. Noelle, will you point to investigation on his page?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Plus zero, cool. 20! I see fucking everything!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, you do. Natural 20, okay. Great, so you look around the room. Any sign of food or clothing has been picked clean. Also, a lot of the paper has been ruined. It seems like they've been using some of the navigational maps to wipe their ass after they go number two. So a lot of the paper is gone. You do find--

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Not so sad that I killed one of them now, huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (exclamations)

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I've got to do a puzzle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's in two pieces. Oh shit, that part's all together! Thank you.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Wait, is this one of the ones they used to wipe their asses or what?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I'll help you help us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is definitely covered in fecal matter. One fell on the floor.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: You're doing great as a DM, but stop throwing the puzzle pieces on the ground, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry. Also, H, you find a couple of items in there.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Oh, sick. Are they guns? I don't know what's wrong with me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You find these two things in the ship. Peter, as you are steering the ship, you notice that if you were to turn about 30 degrees to the right, you might be able to intercept that lifeboat.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh, I do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll another survival check with advantage.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Ooh, that's much better, that is a 29 on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you definitely pilot the craft easily, and as you approach the lifeboat, you see the large form of the Beast furiously paddling away from the action. What would you like to do?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm going to use my Firebolt to blow a hole in his ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are going to attack the Beast?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to fucking attack the Beast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure, sure.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Only his boat, I'm aiming at his boat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, go ahead. Roll for an attack.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: So that's a lot, that's 21.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You definitely hit the ship. Roll for damage on the boat. This is a boat, not a ship. I know sailing terms.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Is Belle anywhere to be seen?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Belle does not exist. Beauty exists, the public domain character.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Do we see Beauty?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: But as you say Belle, the Hunchback goes, "No!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You do not see Beauty anywhere.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay, so that is a seven.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, the front of his lifeboat explodes with magical fire. You definitely got his attention, he turns to you and says: "Oh, oh, are you not a pirate? Oh, please save me, please save me, we "were being attacked."

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I throw him the rope that I was going to throw at the Hatter until he Misty Stepped out of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It takes a couple of minutes, but he uses the boat to climb up and get onto the deck with you. I guess you found the Scarecrow and you're helping him put this puzzle back together?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Yes, and at any moment I get a chance, I brush my fingers across the Hatter's fingers. And I pretend that nothing is happening.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I look over and I see the Queen of Hearts using my move on another guy, and a single dry dusty tear rolls down my face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just perceiving that, I think, some of your pieces go to his, and his go to yours.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Okay, that's why this was so goddamn hard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They must have gotten mixed up my bag.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Oh boy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are the pirates alive? Are we okay? Are we safe?"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Did you kill Beauty? Were you done with that relationship?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "What are you talking about? Did I kill-- I don't have a pirate ship"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Where is your wife?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I don't know, I left her at the ship with you."

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: You took the one lifeboat and sailed away from the sinking ship, that you own, with your wife on it.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: You wanted us to believe in true love?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I was just--"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: And you left her to die?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: This is the least romantic situation--

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I get it dude, you have got to look out for number one, you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I didn't know what to do. I was frightened, my men had all died, and I apologize. I didn't "mean to put you in peril, but I had nothing--"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Your wife!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Is she okay?"

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I would like to cast Zone of Truth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Zone of Truth, go ahead. What is that and what does it do?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: It makes him tell the truth to me, right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, your spellcasting DC is what?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That is a 14.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, hold on. I'm looking up.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I also don't know how to use this spell very well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that's okay, let me find the Beast's stats. You said 14 was your-- And it's versus charisma saving throw. Okay, what did you say it was?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: His eyes seem to shrink back for a moment, and then he looks at you again, harder, and says: "What are you trying to do to me?" It does not work.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Are we all in the Zone of Truth area? Because I think it's an area effect, so are we all affected by it?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yes, you are.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: The range is 60 feet, so we have to roll a charisma saving throw, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, guys!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I love puzzles, Sam!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: This is very important!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Wait, wait!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait what?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Does this count, if I can use my Jack of All Trades to add half my proficiency bonus to my ability check? Does that count as an ability check?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it does not. You cannot add it to a spellcasting ability.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I want to roll a perception check on Beast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just an insight check, right? Okay, roll a d20 and add your insight to that.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: 18 plus--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you got it. You can tell that he is not telling you the whole story.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Can I ask him questions?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, you can ask him a question.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Was your relationship troubled before this cruise?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Unfortunately, yes, it was troubled before the cruise. I was looking at this voyage as a way "to mend our broken bonds. We have been spending a lot of time apart, and actually this is the first "cruise that she's agreed to come on in a long time. I was hoping--"

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Holy fuck, you guys!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: We just found out why!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: "--soon we can be together and we can play 'hooky' "all night long. Love Beauty." I have no idea what that means, you guys!

lines.name: SAM, NOELLE
lines.text: You can read?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I mean, I know basic sounds. I'm not gonna add fucking meaning to them.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: They are color-coded.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Wendy was affected by the Zone of Truth spell, and she just leans in to the Beast and she's like, sounds like your dead wife was cheating on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "I suspected as much. I thought she was cheating on me, but I thought that we could "reconcile our differences. I had no idea who it was, I had no idea it was Captain Jeremy Hook."

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: He gets around.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Wait, no, his head is on a mast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Where?"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Oh my god!"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: It wasn't him. I assure you he was there during the whole attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "He did not attack our vessel?"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: No, the kids did.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: That head used to kiss your dead wife's face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Oh god!"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Wait, are we sure about that?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: We are missing a piece.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: She did use the clever pun "hooky."

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: It's Captain and then the initial is missing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Beast vomits over the side of the deck.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: But she did say play hooky, that is sort of a--

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Let's say I were to flirt with Captain Hook, I would make the exact same joke.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Beast just vomited, you can see his skin is ashen, he drops to his knees and starts sobbing into his hands.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I would like to use Detect Thoughts on the Beast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are marking off all your spells right?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I am, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure you are.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: We should totally Firebolt the Beast.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That is a cantrip, so I can have many of those. I didn't choose very useful spells for my top-tier spells.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, yes. So you hear a voice inside your head that is not your own voice, it's the Beast's voice. The Beast is saying to himself: "My god, I can't believe after all these years, she was "cheating on me... with him. He's such a fucking asshole, the way he parades around with his big "ship and his little helper man Smee, what a fucking asshole. I should have killed him when I "had the chance." That's all you hear.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you would like to probe deeper, you can.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'll do that. How do I do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As an action, you just say, "I want to probe deeper." Your spell DC is 14.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Right as she's about to probe deeper, I shove Peter Pan to the ground.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Hey, what the fuck, man?!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: My face is wild. I suddenly say, did you make fun of me for not being able to read? I don't like it when people call me stupid.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I was just stating a fact that the note is color-coded. And it's a beautiful note, you did that, you put that back together. You did such a good job.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay, just don't anybody ever fucking do that, okay?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I would never.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Don't ever fucking do that.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm also not that smart, I understand.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I take a break. I go to the other side of the ship and I lean over the edge and hyperventilate.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Hang in there, buddy! I believe in you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Peter, right before he pushed you, you had heard the Beast say, in his interior monologue, you had heard him say, "I know what I must do now and it will be glorious--" And that's all you heard before Scarecrow pushed you over.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: How long does Zone of Truth last for?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Who else was in it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, no one's asking you anything.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: What am I rolling? Charisma?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just roll a d20, add your charisma save.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Her spell DC is 14, right? So that affects you. So you have to tell the truth if someone talks to you for the next minute.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: So it says that it is a 15-foot radius and until the spell ends, a creature that enters the spell's area for the first-- oh, for the first time. Never mind. Forget it. I had an idea, but it didn't work. It's fine.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Scarecrow has to roll too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just roll a d20, add your charisma save, see if you are telling the truth, which (whispering) he always is, guys.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Scarecrow passed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. The crisis is averted, calm settles over the ship. So you found the thing, Beast is crying. What would you guys like to do? You're drifting at sea.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I go up to the Scarecrow, who seems alone. I put my arm around you. I say, did I detect a showing of strength back there?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I just don't like it when people say that I'm dumb.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: But you did stand up for yourself.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Yeah. I'm getting tired of this ship.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Well, might I say that I did not expect that to come from a pile of straw and refuse.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Thank you. I put my hand over her hand onto her shoulder and I nod my shoulder and I look out at the ocean.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Food will be there, medical attention-- we could "do something with these disgusting children all about."

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: It's called Pleasure Island. Yes! Yes, we'll go!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, no question. Why don't you go take a nap and we'll drive the ship to Pleasure Island?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Wendy, I got to talk to you--

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: We have so much history together.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That is true. I'm actually trying to talk about something else here, for the first time ever.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: In the form of six or maybe seven grubby children. Our history keeps coming back to us.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: This is specific to our backstory and not the other fairytale characters on this cruise's backstory and that is convenient because I have read up on it--

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: What do you need to tell me?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: He was surprised by the fact that his wife was sleeping with the Beast, but he--

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Captain Hook?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That is what I meant.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I know it's hard for you to imagine Captain Hook with other people.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I don't like that. I don't care for that, okay? I really don't like it when people pay attention to people who aren't me, but it's not about that. I'm saying he knows and he's going to do something bad and I think he wants to go to Pleasure Island to do it. And he didn't know about the affair, but he knew other stuff. I don't think he's up to anything good and we should be ready.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: But why would he be trying to get us specifically?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Maybe he's not! Maybe we're just on his ship, but--

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: It's something in the name. I don't know what it is, it just sounds good.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: And I would be happy, at any point--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: She's always doing this! She's always saying these things to me. It makes me feel bad.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Peter, I think you just need a talk on even terms, in the same room, together. I think we can work through this, maybe on Pleasure Island.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I think that we should not go to Pleasure Island. As much as I love pleasure and also islands--

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Might I jump in here and say, you came from a land called Neverland. But Pleasure Island might also be named Alwaysland. So you had a shitty experience another place, perhaps a differently named place might have a different experience for you?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: She's clearly a therapist, too!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Goldilocks goes for a popcorn maker and maybe some other drinks on the ship just to watch.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I unstitch a pouch that I keep on my belly, which is where I store my ten days' worth of rations that I carry with me. I go, it's kind of covered in moldy old straw, but if you guys are hungry, I got all these rations--

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Do you have popcorn?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: STEFANIE
