lines.text: Does that mean he believes in love less?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you don't know what it does, but he knows what it does and that's all you need to know.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Goldilocks, you seem to have it all figured out.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Excuse me?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Oh, you know, sometimes I think I'm coming on a bit intense, and maybe you had some advice for me.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: It's cool, put it to the side, be like, party girl, and you'll be okay. You like what you like.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I do, but I don't know if it's suiting me well. I like the tiny men.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: You know, I say to each their own. If you know what you love--

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: But how can I be more attractive to the small men?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She is really singularly focused.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I get it, I get it. There's a lot of things that you can do.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Name one.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Well, you can play. Flirt. Be willing to be a wonderful, tall, stately woman that you are, and also get down on their level and do whatever you desire.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Boop.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: That's my flirting style.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Hm, I have a lot to think about. I'm going to do it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In bed. All right, you all find--

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I put all the Lost Boys to bed. I'm going to make sure the Queen does not come anywhere near them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you read them a bedtime story?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: No, I fucking don't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're begging for it.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I sing them a lullaby.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They love you.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Because you almost murdered one.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Right, I feel bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Thank you so much, kind sir! Papa!"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I sneak over to the Scarecrow before I fall asleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: H. MICHAEL: I'm staring at the ocean.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I surreptitiously sneak my hands into his canteen of food.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, roll a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Canteen of food?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: It's his stomach. It's in his body.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vorps, show her where sleight of hand is.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: 16 plus... negative one. So 15.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You definitely feel her reaching into your chest cavity.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Can I fight him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you what? Bite him? Fight? You can attack him, sure.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I'm going to attack him with a Shocking Grasp.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and, you have a spell DC? Oh no, that's a melee attack, because you have to touch him. Roll a d20, add your spell attack modifier. Vorpahl, help her.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: It's a 14 plus three, so I'm at 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: His AC is lower than that. Yes, you definitely hit.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: So I shock and take the chocolate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll a damage roll.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I need to borrow a d8 because my d8 gets twos. Thank you. Seven!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Just for having gorp!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: You know what I came on this boat for? It was because I haven't been hugged by someone in two years! And you know what? My physical touch is so needed! H. MICHAEL: I'm going to use a straw point to attack four times.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: H. MICHAEL: Okay, great.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 11:30 PM.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: So we're still on the same day of our actions from the fighting?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You just took 22 points of damage. Are you alive?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Oh, I'm motherfucking alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before you attack back, where were you guys? Had you all gone to sleep yet?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I'm sleeping soundly.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I'm still singing lullabies to the children.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you hear a scuffle and can go to investigate, but it will take you a little bit to get there.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I would like to go investigate as fast as possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're running over to the melee. Peter and Wendy, where are you guys?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I'm laying awake, you know, when you go to bed mad?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You found a hammock and rolling there.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Very stiff, yeah.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I've gone over and I'm scritching the Beast again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's asleep and he's loving it.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, I hear the sounds, but I'm just like, eh, that'll keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: H.MICHAEL: She woke me up, shock attacked me, so I just whaled on her and now I'm like--

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: H.MICHAEL:You're defending yourself for reaching in my body for fucking granola!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay it's Goldilocks' turn, he just whaled on you with his floppy arms, you got hit every which direction, you don't know what's going on. Goldie, what are you doing?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: So we're still the same day, so I can't use my Thunderwave. Fine. I will use my bonus action, which is a Second Wind, so I get 1d10 plus four heal once per day. So I get a plus seven. I'm back to over half of what my life was. Did I have my longsword or not? Did I need to summon it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can summon it-- well you can't summon it now because you just used your bonus action.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I'll use my action surge, which gives me one extra action per day, to summon my longsword, and then I take my longsword and attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll for attack.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Can I see if I do hear this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll a perception check, with disadvantage because you are asleep.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: 14 plus five. 19.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For sure, you hit.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: That is 1d8 plus two, three plus two. So five.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Can I come over?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: H.MICHAEL: You're walking over? I just go, she attacked me while I was looking out the window, because she wanted granola out of my chest!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I was hungry, you get that, right?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I'm going to cast Entangle on the area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can hit both of them with that for sure.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Leaves and vines sprout out of the wood of the ship and grasp you. Both of you make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Against 15, no, 13. Okay, saving throw. Help him, Noelle.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I barely know these things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I put him next to you because you're good at this! H.MICHAEL: I got a 22.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Magical vines come up from the floor and wrap around your feet. You both are like, "What the "fuck?" and you step out of it. You're not entangled, but the ground around you is difficult to move on, you can't really move forward or backwards too much. It's awkward and confusing to you. The heat of the fight dies down a little bit because you are distracted. What would you like to do now? It is your turn.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: H.MICHAEL: I'm very sensitive about having fingers in my cavities without warning!

lines.name: MOLLY, STEFANIE
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Well, I apologize for attacking you four times.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: And almost killing me?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: But you're like, no, I want to kill you.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I did sort of a flirty thing, I thought you were making a big move, and then you did this shock move on me. And it really hurt my feelings, and literally hurt my body. You fucking electrocuted me. Because I wouldn't give you my chest granola. I feel like I'm in the right here.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I don't know, I'm used to getting-- When I was Goldilocks, when I was blonde, it was just easier. I don't know, I was right all the time.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay, I'm not going to argue with your perception of how your life has changed since this hair color thing happened. But I'm just going to go ahead and say that I don't feel like this is a hair color issue, but let's just leave it.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Fine.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: It's been a crazy day, we're all worked up, we're all trying to find love.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As you part, everyone very eventually finds their way to a bed or something.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Can somebody fucking heal me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You fall asleep, gaining all of your hit points back again. And all your spells.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I want to spoon the Beast as we fall asleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, the Beast does not notice. He feels a warm arm on him and feels nice all night. You guys have a nice slumber through the night, the rocking sea lulls you into a nice, calm rest. All hit points and spells are regained, you're back to normal again. And you sleep for about six to seven hours, and are jolted awake suddenly as the Jolly Roger slams into something.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Who was driving the boat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Inside, there is this amazing hot coal path. To "prove you're really in love, a couple has to walk across the hot coals and kiss in the center, it's "very romantic. Come, come." And he starts dashing up the beach.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I want to roll a perception check on the island.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Insight, oh, perception, go for it.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Either one. Insight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go for it, yeah, perception, yeah. This is good.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That's a 14.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, as far as you can see, there's a treeline up at the top of the dunes, and nothing much beyond it.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'd like to roll-- I'm sorry, is insight reading into his actions? Okay, I'd like to roll insight on him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: This guy is in serious denial.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Seven plus two. Nine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so he's darting across the beach, what do you guys want to do?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I want to follow him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hatter climbs down the rope ladder and starts moving across the sand.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: You guys have to fend for yourselves, okay?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Wait, are you giving them the ship?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: They tried to kill us with the ship, they killed a lot of people with the ship.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: And how are we getting off of this?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: MOLLY; I already did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Woohoo! The ship is ours!"

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: There are other ships on this island.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Are there other ships on this island?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Children, if you take this ship back to your Neverland, I will find you and beat you with my scepter. And I will be your mommy.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: She's the mommy.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I feel like we're giving them mixed messages.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Well, I'm just saying, how are we going to get away from this island without the ship?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The smart one, Curly, steps forward and says, "We don't really know what you want us to do, but "why don't we sit here with the ship until you come back?"

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: And I go: Boop!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He smiles at you; he loves it.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: What if they take the ship?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: We're trapped on Pleasure Island, it'll be awesome!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: It's not awesome!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Beast has now disappeared into the treeline.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'll track him!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I was following. How close was I following?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Is this the natural thing that happens in a game this long, or are we just drunk?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hatter's the only one who still sees him disappearing into the forest.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I see the Hatter disappearing and I follow him.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'm very fast, so I head off. I don't follow with the group, I head off to the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're flanking.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'm flanking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You go into the treeline. It's very dense brush. It's jungly, it's hard to make your way through. You're fast, and you cut through the underbrush as fast as you can. Hatter is still following Beast. Roll a survival check, Hatter.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I'm going to roll one of these cool Wyrmwood ones, now that I've found them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those are not Wyrmwood dice, those are Travis' dice.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Oh, these are Travis' dice? I have Travis' dice? Then this is going to be terrible, isn't it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, survival, you got it. You expertly track him as you go through the jungle, following his every turn. You guys all following?

lines.name: NOELLE, MOLLY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes? Okay. Everyone's following. You make your way--

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I've been tying the Lost Boys to trees.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: So you're going to untie them and tie them to something else? They're getting confusing messages right now!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You get them off the ship, tie them to trees? They're very weak from exhaustion, they just let it happen.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I can do whatever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone besides Wendy is following the Beast.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: It takes a while to tie seven boys to trees!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wendy is for sure lost. You can use survival to try to track their footprints.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I only got a nine for survival.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you think you found a couple footprints and a broken twig and you're following it.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I'm following it. I'm a druid! I'm in touch with nature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me go in and make sure everything's all "right." He disappears into a large wooden door, slams it behind him. What would you like to do?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Can I roll a perception check on Beast?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Insight? Sure.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Insight check on Beast. I have a 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Beast's got fur, but weirdly, he's sweating. Sweat is pouring off of his eyebrows and he seems really nervous about something.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I would like to cast Detect Thoughts on Beast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As he's talking, you cast Detect Thoughts.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That is a nat 20!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it's your spell DC, which is 14, right?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That doesn't actually do that, but, you know what? I did roll a nat 20, so I feel like that should count for something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He rolled an 18. His pupils dilate, but he shakes off the--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: He doesn't get a saving throw for Detect Thoughts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you're right!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: We both did this wrong!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! You can definitely sense his surface thoughts. His surface thoughts are, "I've got to "go. I've got to get inside and talk to Jack right away."

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I would like to probe deeper!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've rolled against that and resolved the roll. You are not able to probe any deeper than that.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Right. Okay.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Guys?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll another survival check.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, nat 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Weirdly, you come up around the back of this building. You're drawn to the nougat and caramel smell. You can see your friends around the side of the building. You make your way up to them. You are rejoined.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'd like to roll-- I'm sorry, I didn't mean to cut you off.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: No, I'm here!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'd like to roll perception on where the arrows are coming from.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The gingerbread house is mostly a one-story building. It is very large. Candy adorns the walls. There are lollipops, beautiful trickling chocolate that has hardened over the side. There are two turrets that have little slits for archers to peek through on both sides of the house. They seemed to have come from those little slits, but you can't see who's in there.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Could I roll a perception check as I come around the back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. What do you want to look at?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I'm looking to see if I notice anything else interesting about this place. I got a 17. As I'm coming around, I'm trying to see what this house is because I'm not sure if my friends are here yet or not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't see any other people around other than them. Weirdly, there's a discarded bag in the forest and you open the bag and find something in it. Sorry.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I find everything!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's weird, it's a small piece of fabric.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Yes, I do find this thing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, you do. A moment or two goes by, the Beast still hasn't come back. From inside-- yes, Hatter?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Because I was following him closest, can I go up and lick the door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely. You lick the door and find that it is dark chocolate and cherry.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I come running up. Do you guys want to go in?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Let's go in!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Wendy, are the children sufficiently tied up?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I leashed them, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They are sugar-glass windows. There are two or three of them around the side of the building.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I just found this thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From inside the gingerbread house, you hear a female scream and male laughter. Also, someone cursing in Italian.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I hate all three of those sounds. Come around to the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to smash the window?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I hear a sound and I go inside. I still smash it partly in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just roll.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I just jump. That is a six. I don't know what I'm rolling for.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wendy grabs your arm and your strike goes errant and hits the gingerbread and knocks off a chunk of gingerbread.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Come on. I take this thing out of my bag and slap it against the wall.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: What is it?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a piece of fabric, what, six feet wide? The piece of fabric adheres to the side of the gingerbread house and all of a sudden the gingerbread melts away, revealing a hole six feet in diameter.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Ten feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten feet. It's through the gingerbread, which is about six inches of wall. There's now a hole into this building that you can look. It's dim inside, but glowing red. Would you like to go in, peer in, what would you like to do?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I'm clearly not one for waiting too long.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: A lady was screaming; let's go!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: A grab the Queen of Hearts' hand and we rush in.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I like it very much! (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is what you can do with all of your kids' Legos. You do not go in through the front door. Instead, you're going to come over here.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Whoa, break this building!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a hole here and you guys are going in. Who's going first?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I took a picture of you because I saw how proud you were of this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who does? Wendy's going first. That's Wendy right there. Who's next?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Hatter and the Queen.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Yes. Hatter and the Queen, holding hands.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Holding hands, not letting go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who else?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I run in, but I grab off a piece of dark chocolate on the way in.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: There it is! You found it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to say you go over here.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I don't need a Scarecrow!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scarecrow and Pete.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm going to go in, but I'm going to disguise myself as some gumdrops. I'm going to use Disguise Self to look like candy gumdrops and chocolate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to say this is Peter Pan.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Oh my gosh, that's amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They look like gumdrops.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I flatten against a wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're over here with a bunch of candy.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'm not going to enter through the hole. I'm going to come around the side and I'm going to use my spider pill to crawl up the wall and try to break one of the windows so I can come in from a different angle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll a strength check. His spider pill gives him Spider Climb, so he's walking up the side of the wall like Spider-Man would.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I rolled a five plus two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're up there working on it. I'll put you up there for now.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: That's so cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You walk in. Where am I? The main hall is dimly lit, shadows streaking across the walls making it hard to identify much. As you get closer, you see the source of the light: a large, 20-foot long track in the center of the room, red with glowing, blistering embers. It is the hot coal path. Warmth emanates across the room. On the opposite side of the room, over here, these guys over here are ice sculptures. Three ice sculptures. Let's see here, who's closest? Goldilocks, make a quick perception check.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I roll a 14 plus, anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine, that'll do it. Their faces are in agony, but they've been positioned together in a way that makes them look like they're locked in romantic poses.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: The ice sculptures?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Singles cruises are for pathetic, stupid people "who all wind up sad and alone. And I refuse to be a part of the lie any longer. Along with my friend "Jack Frost over there, we've started a new business: changing you ugly love birds into "beautiful statues. My wife turned my heart to ice, and now I will do the same to every lover I meet." Go ahead and roll for initiative as he roars at you furiously.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: As he does that, I look at my new friends and I say to them: I don't know what exactly he's talking about, but I have to admit that I've fantasized about each one of you. So I know that love still exists in some way!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Goldilocks says: Homegirl, that's not love, that's something else, but please roll.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I do look very delicious as some candy in the corner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll for initiative. What you got? Noelle?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I have a 15.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, Mol?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Big old five.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Dirty 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Hatter?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Dirty 18. I'm going to use Travis' dice from now on.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: This is Beast here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is Beast.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: This is Beast on the other side of the coals?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beast is going to roar at you guys. He is not going to move. He's going to hold his attack until someone gets closer. Top of the round. Scarecrow and Queen of Hearts, who wants to go first?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I defer to the lady.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: That's 30 and I don't actually have dash, but I could use my action to move double speed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, you can get closer to him, but you won't be able to attack.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: That is fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You get right up. Do you want to go around the coals?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: No, right through them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right through them! You get right up to the coals. Roll a dexterity save.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Come on! I have advantage on dex saves, if I can see it, which I can. That's pretty cool. Oh yay! 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, good. Are you resistant to anything?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I do have resistance, but not to fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You take two points of fire damage as you start to run into the coals. You are within range, he attacks you with his spear. He's going to throw a spear at you.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He only rolled a seven. His spear flies away from him and clatters across the stone ground.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Into a Reese's Peanut Butter cup.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Scarecrow, it's your turn.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Here's a question. I wanted to come to the side because I wanted the element of surprise, but now I'm the first to go. So is there a way to hold until the ice boy has his back completely turned to me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: His back is to you right now; he's not looking out the window.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Does that give me an advantage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, he won't see you. He may hear you as you crash through the window.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: That makes sense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You won't be able to do anything from outside.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Right. Oh, I'm still outside?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're trying to get in. You tried on the last roll and it didn't work.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Do I have room for an action and an attack to try to break the glass, or is that considered an attack?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can use your action to break the glass, sure.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: So I'll try to break the glass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, go for it.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Oh shit. Four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You rolled a four?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take another attack because you get a bonus action as monk, right?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: That's for an attack, is that for--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're hitting it with your hand, yeah.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Eight plus two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you hit it. It's glass. Yes. Roll for damage.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Three plus two. Five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One pane shatters. You're trying to start wiggling your way in and you get about halfway in.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'm going to use one of my darts on ice guy from the outside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! Wait, those were your actions.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay, so that was my confusion because I thought action and attack were different.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Action can be either attack or doing something significant like trying to break a window. But you need to get in there, so you did good. You have your straw points that you can use if you really wanted to.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I can't do much from outside. You know what I'm going to do? For the rest of my turn, I'll move one block over, out of sight, so you can't attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're staying outside, just out of range.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: The window is slightly broken, but I'm going to move slightly over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Second turn is Jack Frost. He does not see Scarecrow, so instead he's going to move right past Peter Pan who is this pack of Smarties, not noticing him. He's going to attack with his ice breath against you two. Shit, shit, shit! Frost breath. Wendy and Mad Hatter.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I'm up by Beast on the coals.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: We were holding hands, now we're not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: You raged, I understand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You both dodge out of most of the frosty blast's range. You only take two points of damage and you feel a chill come across you as ice coats your eyebrows and makes you all shivery.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: That's the worst, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is his action and his movement and that's it for him. Next is Peter Pan! What would you like to do?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: How far am I from Mr. Beast over there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Far.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: How far?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like 40, 50 feet.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay. Is it 40 or 50? This is important.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! 55.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: 55? Well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a big ass room.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: It's a big ass room. I'm going to use my Jump spell to go 48 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 48 feet? Oh because it's your--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: With a ten-foot head start, I'm going to use Jump across the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As soon as this thing of gumdrops starts moving, it jumps across. I think Disguise Self is concentration?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yeah, it is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you lose concentration and in mid-air turns into a sort of flying Peter Pan. It kind of looks like he's flying, he does a cool spin move and he lands right here next to the Beast.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: So I did that. Now I'm here and that's all cool and good. I have an action left, yeah?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have a bonus action! I don't know what you can do as bonus.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm unfamiliar with playing a bard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus actions are usually healing things for bards. You can inspire someone.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Who else is over here? The Queen of Hearts is over here. I will use my bardic inspiration to give the Queen of Hearts an extra 1d6 to an ability check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Peter looks over at you with fire burning in his sort of handsome, small man eyes. He looks so hot and sexy that the Queen shudders and swoons and gets an extra d6 to her next roll. The next up is the Beast. He's going to turn to you Peter and take his first attack, rolled a natural one. He bites at you, but you're so small and fast that he misses.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: And bites his cheek by accident! It hurts.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: 45 damage, he's dead!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the Beast. Next is Goldilocks.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I'm going to ask Wendy. What is the damage of your Amy Vorpahl sword?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: You want it? I can't really use swords.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Yeah, can I have it?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I toss it to you.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I do, but if I get that, I can use a second sword.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, it's a shortsword, we'll say. Hey, what was your initiative roll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit, I skipped you.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: We'll come back to me.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Hey, Sam, question. This is as a person, not as a character. Can I have Skittles?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, you can. That's Halloween candy. Sure, go ahead.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I can't imagine it now that those are gone.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: You ruined everything! You've broken the world.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Should've shared your gorp.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're asking for a sword, is that's what's going on?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Wendy says I may have the Vorpahl sword.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I toss the Amy Vorpahl sword to you. Does Amy say anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does the Amy Vorpahl sword say?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I receive it, oh, wow.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Not as a queen, not as a queen.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Not as a queen, I say: Aw man, yeah, new friend, man. Kind of shafted by one, but you know, you get a new one, that's life, man.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I don't know how to use swords.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I say: damn, Vorpahl sword, you seem so friendly.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Yeah, dude, you too.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I'll stab the shit out of people with you. Thanks.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: This is how Goldilocks-- yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, you've got a longsword and a shortsword now, you're dual-wielding.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I move towards Jack Frost, and then I use my longsword attack but one-handed with the longsword, so I can use the Vorpahl sword on the other hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm gonna have to say that you used your bonus action to catch that sword, so you get one attack this round. You'll get two next round.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Okay, so then I can only do one attack?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One attack this round, and you're holding two swords, so it is a one-handed attack.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: So just with one hand, not two?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. You do have some bonus surge-y thing, I think.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I have an action surge where I get one extra action per day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you could have two hits, if you want.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I'll do that, where I use the action surge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Action surge against Jack Frost, roll twice.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Roll twice, so this one is for the longsword. It's a 13 plus five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You definitely hit.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: And now we use-- please be lucky. Five plus two, seven.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can use luck to re-roll that, right? Aren't you lucky?

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I can.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: That's a pretty good roll.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: We'll keep that seven.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what did you-- Oh, that's damage! Okay, seven points, great. Thank you.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Seven points damage and now, what's the Vorpahl sword damage again?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Another d20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I don't know the stats of the Vorpahl sword, but it's a standard shortsword. It's a d8 plus two? d6, we'll say d6.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: 15 plus--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great, you hit, for sure. d6 plus two.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: d6 plus two, six plus two, eight! I high-five my Vorpahl sword.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He is definitely injured, he snarls and growls at you.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I say: we are slashin' in fashion.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I wink at the Vorpahl sword. I say, you get a piece of chocolate, Vorpahl sword.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Amy Vorpahl, your Amy Vorpahl impression is so weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I skipped the Hatter, go ahead, Yuri, it's your turn.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I'm going to cast a Scorching Ray at Jack Frost and at the Beast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scorching Ray, what's the range?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: It's 120 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, nice! And you can target two?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I can go up to three targets. So the Beast, Jack Frost, and that Hershey's Bar back there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can target one guy twice, if you want.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Can you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think so, you can send two bolts to one guy.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Jack Frost, Hershey bar, Jack Frost, Hershey bar. Jack Frost gets two, the Beast gets one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think you roll a melee attack?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: It's a ranged attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a ranged attack? So roll a d20 and add your-- this thing, plus four.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Nine. I mean, I have to roll for each one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, roll two more times.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: So the Beast doesn't get hit at all?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The first one misses the Beast and starts melting the chocolate wall here.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: You know, I'm still kind of okay with that.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I'm very impressed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's against the Beast?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: No, these last two are against Jack Frost.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jack Frost? That hits Jack Frost. Roll for damage.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Great, and that-- I looked it up, and I forget. And it's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I might have it here somewhere.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: 2d6, nine. And then there is a second ray.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As you fire against Jack Frost, he opens his mouth to blast you with ice, but your fire bolt enters his mouth and his head explodes, killing him instantly. Jack Frost is dead.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: That happened.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where would you like to attack next?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I get another attack?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's three bolts, right?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Yeah, well, the Beast again. No, the Hershey bar! No, the Beast. You know what? The Mad Hatter would attack the Hershey bar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Hershey bar melts, and this whole side of the wall starts to collapse as well.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Chicory-chic-chola-chola.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any bonus actions? Any movements? Do you want to get closer to anybody?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I'll move towards the Beast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I don't know how I'm supposed to move, let's see here. Great. Okay, that was Hatter. We also did-- Goldilocks moved already, right? So we're to Wendy Darling.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Cool. So the Beast is the only enemy in this room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That you can see.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: (gasps, whispers) Who's that?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I'm going to walk as close to the Beast as I can. 30 feet. With one move, 30 feet. And say, hey buddy, I'm sure we can work this all out. And I'm going to cast Charm Person. So he has to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. Let's do it. Against your spell DC of?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Against 13.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 13?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Yeah. I don't know why it's so bad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: NOELLE, AMY
lines.text: He beats it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He beats it. Thank you, Amy. He shakes off the charm. It does not work. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Oh no. That's okay. Yeah, he has advantage anyway because we're fighting against him. Well, I gave it a shot. Can I make a perception check, too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. As your bonus action, why not? You're looking around. Roll a perception check.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: That's a 21.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. You definitely see, lurking in the shadows back there, a large, large guy. He's a-- the camera can't see, but there's a big green guy over there lurking in the chocolate.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Okay. Can I warn my friends or--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. Go ahead.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Yeah. In the corner with the chocolate! It's big and green!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's four corners of chocolate. Nobody knows where he is.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Wendy's not very good at communication.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: The candy! Look for the candy!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Thank you for finally admitting that. Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From out of nowhere, this crazy character comes in and you hear a (pipe sounds). You get the sense that this guy usually plays pipes to do things to people and he's going to target the Queen. He's going to cast--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Is he small? Is he a tiny man?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He is a half-elf. He's going to cast Crown of Madness against you. You have to roll a save. It's a wisdom save, right? I think it's wisdom.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Wisdom isn't my best trait, so (singing) come on baby, be good to me! Awesome! Okay, 18 with no modifier!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me roll for the troll. The troll will be in order next. So that is the top of the round. Who is first? Scarecrow and Queen of Hearts. You guys are up.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: As always, I defer.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Awesome. So what is my perception-- oh, who cares? I'm raging. So I don't care. I don't care what anyone's doing to the Beast. I am running right up to him and smacking him with my scepter twice! In my frenzy--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll for attack twice.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I'm also recklessly attacking with this. Next time, he can advantage on me, but right now, I also get advantage on him. So does an 18 hit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An 18 hits, yes.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: And does a-- oh, higher than that. 21.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, that hits.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: And I yell, give me love! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scarecrow, it's your turn.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I have this opening in the window, so I want to open the window.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. You can open the window.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: And I'd like to drop down and use my 40 feet of movement to move to the center of the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so it takes ten feet to get down and then we'll say you get to about there.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Great. And then I have-- my dart's range. It says 20/60. What does that mean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can throw it 20 feet, no problem. If you throw at 60 feet, you have to roll with disadvantage to hit. So you can hit him, but you've got to roll with disadvantage. We'll say you can just barely hit that guy.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Why not? I'll huck a fucking dart at this motherfucker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So roll twice. Take the lower of the two.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: With my d20?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Two and a 15. So I'll take a four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The dart sails up into the air and falls right about here. Just kind of shy. Your arms are not made of muscle. They are straw. They can't throw very hard.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Is there anything else I can do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have bonus. Any bonus-y type of action-y or special move?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Not much. It doesn't say how far I can menace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Menace would be an action, not a bonus action, I believe.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: That makes sense. Okay, I just go: sorry, guys! Window was a super bad idea! My heart was in the right place. Wish I'd been more helpful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hatter, you're up. Oh, you could also use an item, by the way, if you need it. I don't know what else you have, but you could--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Suspenders?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) You flick your suspenders. Hatter, you're up.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Then in that case, I'll take a nibble of one of my pieces of granola from my chest pouch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: It's so nutritious, wow!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Have a nice little snack.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I'm going to cast Tasha's Hideous Laughter at the Beast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Versus a wisdom saving throw. What's your spellcasting ability? It's 13, I think.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: 13. Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He rolled a seven. He does not--

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Yeah! The Beast, it sucks! (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. He looks at this strange, funny little man wearing a funny little hat and he can't help it. He's overcome with the giggles. He starts laughing and he cannot stop. I'm looking up Tasha's Hideous Laughter right now to find out what happens. So the range is 30 feet, so have to come a little closer for that. It's okay. You did it. You're concentrating on it. He's just rolling with laughter, slapping his knees, and he falls prone and is unable to stand up.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Hilarious.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: In my rage, I look at you and my eyes are just hearts.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Heart binoculars.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Heart binoculars. Yeah, badoinga.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Badoinga. Okay, that was the Hatter. We're down to-- Jack Frost is dead. Peter Pan!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: This will make it easier now that he is prone. So I imagine I get some sort of advantage or he gets disadvantage. I want to leap forward and pour my Philter of Love down his throat.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Philter of Love? That's what you have?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I have that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to pour the Philter of Love down the Beast's throat.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Yes! While staring into his eyes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. What is the-- did I write down the spell DC?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: If they are a species and gender you are attracted to, you regard it as true love.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Guys, she just used love.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It just works.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: The spell just works. I was preparing to do an acrobatics check or anything, but since he is prone--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Beast is confused. He's laughing hysterically, so his mouth is open. There is a thick, viscous liquid being poured down his gullet. He looks at you with strange eyes. He doesn't like the taste. He snarls at you and growls, and turns around to the Queen and smiles with love.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I have so many emotions right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --and starts purring at you. He's not wearing any clothing. You can see, visibly--

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Wait, how long has he not been wearing any clothing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Always! He's a beast! Oh wait, no, he's wearing a pink leisure suit. Underneath his pink leisure suit, you see a little bulge forming on his nethers. He is charmed, and now he's in love with you.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action to step away. And you still have your bardic inspiration from me, if I am not mistaken, so have at it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, it is now the Beast's turn. Even though he fucking loves you--

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: He used his boner action already, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --he's going to try to stop laughing. He definitely stops laughing. The feeling of love overcomes him and he shakes off the laughter. He uses half his movement to stand up. He takes his giant claws and takes a big, sweeping swing, not at you, but turning around and sweeping to attack Peter Pan, right there.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I would do anything for love.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He rolls a 20. He definitely bites you. Vicious teeth sink into you.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Okay. Buy me dinner first!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You take, okay, hold on. You take six points of bite damage.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: That's fine, I'll absorb that. It's worth it for true love.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And he is super pissed off. Yes.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Queen, it's your time. This is your moment. Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Goldilocks is next. Go ahead, Goldie.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Well, first, I call out to Wendy and say, hey, if you turn into a bird, you should pick me up and drop me off somewhere close to people, where I can use my Thunderwave.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: It's not that far!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Fine! I'll get there, but I only have 30 steps, just saying. If the people in whatever corner, because you couldn't specify, if you happened to remember which corner they are, feel free to pick me up and drop me off near one of those corners. Anyway, then I take my movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you take your movement. As you go, you see one of the ice sculptures, Geppetto, is desperately trying to break out of his ice. He's trying to talk to you in his thick Italian accent, which I am going to attempt. "Hey! La dolce! Don't you see? He just wants love!" Okay, that's all he says as you walk by him.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Goldilocks says, I really loved playing Mario as a kid, so you are just adorable, Geppetto. Is there anything I can do to help you out of your misery?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like how you're having a calm, casual conversation. "Don't worry about me! Just soothe "the Beast with love!"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Don't you worry, Geppetto. So that's as far as I go, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can get a little further.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Yeah, the closest I can possibly get.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The heat from the coals is starting to burn your face.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: This can only be used if I'm close, or not?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: That is a touch attack, yeah.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Yeah, so I'll use my crossbow and aim toward the Beast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll an attack.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: 15 plus four, 19!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You definitely hit. Roll for damage.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Awesome. We'll use the precious. Three.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's some damage. "Argh!" Your crossbow bolt buries itself into his thigh. He writhes in pain, but he still loves you. Next up is Wendy Darling.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: So I think I can do it, because it's got a range of 60 feet and it looks like he's about 60 feet away. He has to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me see what he does. This guy's dead. Oh, this guy's huge. His saving throw is a two. He does not resist it at all.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Okay. Hell yeah! Got a 12. That was max damage. So yeah, he takes 12 fire damage. It's basically burning there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So the fire starts to melt the candy piles around him. He starts to slowly sink into the candy floor.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: It's a five-foot-diameter sphere, by the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's considered grappled here, by the chocolate.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: It shines bright light in a 20-foot radius, by the way, so if there's anyone else hiding around here, they're all revealed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (troll noises) "You didn't even find out if I was nice or not!"

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Wait, can we perception to see? Oh my god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He seems to have blood all over him. It's probably okay.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I'm going to run over here because, Peter, you took a hit. I'm going to yell, You okay?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm fine. Don't worry about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, so proud. Okay.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Dying will be an awfully big adventure.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I have Cure Wounds! You don't have to go there yet! I have a Cure Wounds spell!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Pied Piper is up. The Pied Piper starts playing a stupid fucking flute. (flute dooting) He's going to try to charm you, Hatter. Yes. His DC is 13. Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: So, a four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You turn to the Scarecrow, fire in your eyes.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Hey, how are you doing? Pretty crazy we're in this big fire, right? But at least we have each other!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: You are so stupid!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And the Pied Piper is going to give a little healing to his friend, the Beast. Okay. That's the Piper's turn. Troll is going to try to break the grapple. He succeeds. Bursts out of the chocolate! Rargh! That's his action.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Does he end his turn there?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: He takes more damage. Four damage. Well, the Flaming Sphere is still present in the situation.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Next round, Scarecrow and the Queen of Hearts are up. Right at the top of the round, Scarecrow, you're close to Geppetto also. Geppetto is desperately, "Don't you see? He just needs love!"

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Right to the quick. But a part of me knows, I've learned from attacking a friend, getting into a physical altercation with a friend. And so-- Absolutely, I'm focused on the Queen of Hearts at this moment. Because she hasn't tried to steal anything out of my body!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Queen of Hearts is getting it!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: So I'm going to-- Now, there's no way for me to know how long the Pied Piper's effects are going to last?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you have no idea what's going on. You just saw the Mad Hatter turn to you and smile.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Goldilocks takes a second to yell to Scarecrow, hey, I don't believe in love anymore, but I know you're not stupid. I know you're smart.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Okay, so I think I'm going to keep more people from being put under this spell. I'm going to use menacing against the Pied Piper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, go for it. Yes, roll, and he's going to roll against it.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Let's see. So, 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He rolled an 18. He is scared of you, very scared. He sees a weird straw man with granola dribbling out of his chest.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: That is basically your purpose in life. You just fulfilled your purpose in life.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you rip your head apart?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: No, this time I open my mouth like a snake. My jaw pops down and the worst, wettest straw from the inside of me rolls out like awful gray spaghetti onto the ground.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: You are a Guillermo del Toro character.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's watching this happen, playing his flute, and his jaw drops. His flute drops. He's so confused. The eyes of the Hatter flash back to life. He is fine again.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: You're not stupid! I love you! You're the smartest person I know!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Intimidated by you.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: This menacing shit is the tits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Really is. Okay, so that's Scarecrow. Queen of Hearts?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I see the Beast attacking my friend, Peter, and I also know that I might have a little bit of power, but I'm still angry. So I shake him and I say, hey you! Get over here! And I very angrily grapple him and I try to grab him. Yeah, I'm going to grapple him. I don't know if he would even resist, but we'll see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's not resisting. He lets it happen. He's in this weird hug.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Yes, it's just as awkward as it was with the Scarecrow. My legs are not where they need to be and I restrain him as well, so he's also restrained.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He gives into it and he's hugging you back with a very loving, caring hug.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Okay, and I do the thing that I feel is right, and I try to find a spot on his enormous mouth lip to kiss.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going in for a kiss?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: But an angry, rageful kiss.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, that's the best kind.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Is that the best kind? What have your relationships been like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's see here. He's shaking, there's a lot going on. Let's say that this is, what kind of a check is this? A kiss check! How about an animal handling check?

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: That makes sense.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: This is a straight zero modifier for me. It's an 11.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's really going at it with you. You can smell rotten meat, and you can kind of see some of Captain Hook's hair right here at the corner of his mouth.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: Just saying.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Copy that! I'm taking him for the team!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you kiss him back? Are you in it?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I mean, how many times do I have to kiss?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I mean, are you resisting, or are you in it?

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I am letting-- This was the goal, so it's going better/worse than I thought. The main thing is to turn his attention away from my friends and onto me, who I am very confident that he won't hurt. So yeah, I am letting it, very much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The kiss continues for an uncomfortable amount of time.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I do what I think I should and kind of grope at his tummy. Oh, well, I don't know if I can reach around his entire--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the weirdest romantic--

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Basically the most romantic thing we've ever seen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. And in the corner, half-frozen Geppetto is saying, "Yes, yes, yes!" The coals and the fire flare with a burst of fire that fills the room with light for a second. The Beast drops to one knee, startled and stunned. He says, "No, no! Yes, yes!" He goes in for another kiss. He looks panicky. His skin is growing paler. His shoulders are slumping. He's growing weaker as he kisses you, and weaker. Finally he collapses on the ground. The troll, confused, turns and goes to eat some chocolate. Whatever magic was controlling him, the spell has been broken. The Pied Piper is looking around like, oh shit! Please don't hurt me! I'm really weak! The Beast is writhing in pain on the floor. He's alive, but in bad shape.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Is he still a beast, or is he human?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's still a beast, but he's curled up in a fetal position.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: No one ever wants to have sex with me! I ruin everything!

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I'm going to go up to her and say, Hey! Remember how previously you only wanted tiny men? I feel like you've made a character development!

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: This is an arc for you!

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I'm 6'6", but I'm into fucking you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or when you stop believing in fairy tales. Or when "you feel that life simply isn't right. Sorry, you both."

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: I'm going to try to forget this day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "Remember that in the end, no matter what we do, true love always prevails." This is where I ran out of time to write it, so everyone stands back up. It was all a dream! I don't know, that's the end.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Scarecrow, how much for the hat?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: My skater-themed scarecrow hat? I'll fresh-up swap you for whatever you got.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: Fair enough. I will do anything for that hat.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I can't believe I did all this fighting and didn't even get fingered! I just got chest cavity.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I will finger you for that hat.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Done! Hot deal.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Use your Mage Hand.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: I will use my Mage Hand.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: The bonus episode.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Can I do a dexterity roll to jack him off?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why not. Roll a d20.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: Five. It takes forever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's dry.

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: You are bright red tomorrow.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: It's nothing but straw.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: There has to be a subculture for that.

lines.name: YURI
lines.text: The Hatter's into that.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: Straw dog! It's straw dog!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you all for playing. Thank you for giving yourself to the romance. Tell me this, do you think Peter and Wendy are going to get back together?

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I'm over here trying to act up how wounded I am, in hopes that she'll come over and use her healing touch on me.

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: Yeah, I think I fucking fall for it and I go and cradle your head. I'm like, you idiot. You fucking idiot. And I heal you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Scarecrow and the Hatter end up together?

lines.name: MOLLY
lines.text: And I'm like, can we please get out of this horrible place?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I've got to say, as somebody who's been in relationships that are a vicious cycle, these two should

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: I think that it's true love! I do believe in love, I do!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I will be rooting for you two!

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: You deserve love, you beautiful girl!

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: Well, thank you so much for saying that! Is Beauty and the Beast, are they still a thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For the next 55 minutes, he loves her. I'm sorry, Beauty and the Beast? Yeah, they're still together. They're married.

lines.name: STEFANIE
lines.text: I feel like there's ploy for polyamory right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: NOELLE
lines.text: You could join a threesome with Beauty and Beast.

lines.name: AMY
lines.text: I was only looking for a king, but if I got a second queen? I'm in. It's Beauty and the Beast and the Me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Buy it with your money. What?

lines.name: HMICHAEL
lines.text: I just drank so much apple juice. How am I getting home?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [music]
